T02D2533:27b-1: a'ar+ya n'a ma sam g'i ti t'i k'a n'a ma mantr'arth'a ba lo ki ni n'a ma /
T02D2533:27b-3: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher
T02D2533:27b-4: 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par
T02D2533:27b-6: rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2533:27b-7: dus gsum skyob pa'i ye shes zla //
T02D2533:27b-9: zab cing rgya che'i chos ldan pa /
T02D2533:27b-10: de bzhin yang dag mchan brjod 'di'o //
T02D2533:27b-11: rnal 'byor spyod dang bya ba'i rgyud //
T02D2533:27b-12: de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02D2533:27b-13: mdo sde chos mngon sdo snod dang //
T02D2533:27b-14: rnam 'grel gzhan yang bltas pa dang //
T02D2533:27b-15: da ltar 'das dang skyes rabs te //
T02D2533:27b-16: stod byed gzhung dang de bzhin du //
T02D2533:27b-17: sems tsam smra ba thams cad dang ;
T02D2533:27b-18: / de bzhin dbu ma'i gang yin dang //
T02D2533:27b-19: 'jig rten gtsug lag de bzhin te //
T02D2533:27b-20: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim 'ongs pa'i //
T02D2533:27b-21: man ngag kyang ni legs dran te //
T02D2533:27b-22: gsol ba 'debs pas bdag gis de //
T02D2533:27b-23: sems can blo zhan rnams la ni //
T02D2533:27b-24: snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis su //
T02D2533:27b-25: shin tu zab cing rgya che ba //
T02D2533:27b-26: de yi rnam par bshad par bya //
T02D2533:27b-27: de nas da ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
T02D2533:27b-28: 'di'i lus rnam par gzhag pa mngon par brjod par
T02D2533:27b-29: bya'o // 'di lta ste zhus pa dang /
T02D2533:27b-31: rigs drug la gzigs pa dang /
T02D2533:27b-32: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D2533:27b-33: byang chub kyi sems dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas dang /
T02D2533:27b-34: rang bzhin gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos
T02D2533:27b-35: kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par snang mdzad chen
T02D2533:27b-37: me long lta bu'i ye shes mi bskyod pa'i sgo
T02D2533:27b-38: nas dang so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D2533:27b-39: snang ba mtha' yas kyi sgo nas dang /
T02D2533:27b-40: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgo nas dang /
T02D2533:27b-41: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes don yod grub pa'i sgo nas dang /
T02D2533:27b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sgo nas ye shes lnga la bstod pa dang /
T02D2533:27b-45: nye bar bsdu ba rnams te /
T02D2533:28a-3: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2533:28a-4: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te //
T02D2533:28a-5: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug //
T02D2533:28a-6: ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad bcu drug gis zhus pa'o //
T02D2533:28a-7: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
T02D2533:28a-8: ces pa dang po nas brtsams te //
T02D2533:28a-9: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol //
T02D2533:28a-10: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad drug gis ni slar gsungs pa'o //
T02D2533:28a-11: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
T02D2533:28a-12: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang //
T02D2533:28a-13: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te //
T02D2533:28a-14: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
T02D2533:28a-15: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad gnyis kyis ni rigs drug la gzigs pa'o //
T02D2533:28a-16: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
T02D2533:28a-17: ces pa dang po nas brtsams te /
T02D2533:28a-18: aa ra pa tsa na ya te nam:zhes pa'i bar
T02D2533:28a-19: gyi tshigs bcad gsum gyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon
T02D2533:28a-20: par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa gsungs so
T02D2533:28a-21: // 'di ltar zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te /
T02D2533:28a-22: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog //
T02D2533:28a-23: ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad bcu bzhis rdo rje
T02D2533:28a-24: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo nas byang chub
T02D2533:28a-25: kyi sems rdo rje mngon par brjod pa'o //
T02D2533:28a-26: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02D2533:28a-27: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te //
T02D2533:28a-28: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02D2533:28a-29: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshig rkang gcig ma tshang ba'i
T02D2533:28a-30: tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngas shin tu rnam par
T02D2533:28a-31: dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo
T02D2533:28a-32: nas bstod pa'o // rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed //
T02D2533:28a-33: ces pa dang po nas brtsams te /
T02D2533:28a-34: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog //
T02D2533:28a-35: ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad bcus me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02D2533:28a-36: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2533:28a-37: ces pa dang po nas brtsams te //
T02D2533:28a-38: ye shes me lce 'od 'bar bar gsal //
T02D2533:28a-39: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
T02D2533:28a-40: kyis so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2533:28a-42: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
T02D2533:28a-43: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te /
T02D2533:28a-44: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces pa'i
T02D2533:28a-45: bar gyi tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhis mnyam pa
T02D2533:28a-46: nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02D2533:28a-47: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
T02D2533:28a-48: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te /
T02D2533:28b-0: @28b 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces
T02D2533:28b-1: pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad bco lngas bya ba nan
T02D2533:28b-2: tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02D2533:28b-3: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2533:28b-4: ces pa dang po nas brtsams te //
T02D2533:28b-5: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2533:28b-6: ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad lngas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2533:28b-7: pa lnga'i sgo nas ye shes lnga la bstod pa'o
T02D2533:28b-8: // lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te //
T02D2533:28b-9: chos kyi rgyal po thob po zhes pa'i bar gyis ni yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02D2533:28b-10: aom sarba dharm'a zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te /
T02D2533:28b-11: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D2533:28b-12: tshigs bcad gsum dang tshig rkang gnyis dang yi ge
T02D2533:28b-13: bzhis ni sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02D2533:28b-14: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2533:28b-15: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te //
T02D2533:28b-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
T02D2533:28b-17: ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad lngas ni nye bar bsdus pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o ;
T02D2533:28b-18: / de ltar de dag gcig tu bsdus nas tshigs
T02D2533:28b-19: su bcad pa brgya drug cu rtsa gnyis rnams dang
T02D2533:28b-20: / yon tan brgya lnga bcu'i gzhung gis bcom ldan
T02D2533:28b-21: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
T02D2533:28b-22: kyi sku 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan yang
T02D2533:28b-23: dag par brjod pa'i don bsdus pa'o /
T02D2533:28b-26: // / 'dir tshig gi don la the tshom gyis thams cad la 'brel pa dang /
T02D2533:28b-27: brjod bya dang dgos pa dang /
T02D2533:28b-28: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'i dbang gis rtog pa sngon
T02D2533:28b-29: du gtong ba rnams 'jug pas na mtshan yang dag
T02D2533:28b-30: par brjod pa 'di 'brel pa la sogs pa yang
T02D2533:28b-31: brjod par bya'o // de ltar yang 'di'i 'brel pa dang /
T02D2533:28b-32: brjod bya ci stem bstan na de'i cho smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du ma 'brel pa dang /
T02D2533:28b-33: don med par yang dogs pa'i rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams nyan par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2533:28b-35: brjod bya gdon mi za bar brjod dgos so //
T02D2533:28b-36: dad pa dang ldan pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2533:28b-37: kyi bka' tshad mar byas te 'jug pa nyid yin
T02D2533:28b-38: pas de la brjod bya la sogs pa smos ci
T02D2533:28b-39: dgos te / ci'i phyir smos mi dgos she na /
T02D2533:28b-40: de rnams kyi dad pa tsam gyis rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:28b-41: de la 'dir brjod bya ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2533:28b-42: yon tan las kyang de skad gsungs te /
T02D2533:29a-1: su med pa gzung ba'i don du mtshan gzung bar bstan to zhes so //
T02D2533:29a-2: rjod byed ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o //
T02D2533:29a-3: bklag pa ni brjod pa ste /
T02D2533:29a-4: yang dag par brjod pa'i mtshan rnams ni yang dag par brjod pa ste //
T02D2533:29a-5: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o //
T02D2533:29a-7: bya ba'i rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud dang /
T02D2533:29a-8: gsung rab mdo sde mtha' dag dang /
T02D2533:29a-11: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /
T02D2533:29a-12: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba thams cad de /
T02D2533:29a-13: de rnams kyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa ni
T02D2533:29a-14: gtso bo ma yin pas gnas pa ste dan dam
T02D2533:29a-17: kun nas srid rtses yongs bcad pa //
T02D2533:29a-18: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam mo //
T02D2533:29a-20: 'di dag ni rjod byed dang brjod bya'i mtshan nyid dam /
T02D2533:29a-21: thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa'o //
T02D2533:29a-22: dgos pa yang gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa dang /
T02D2533:29a-23: de kho na nyid yid la byed pa gnyis kyis
T02D2533:29a-24: chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa lhur len pa
T02D2533:29a-25: rtog pa med pa'i shes rab kyis 'byed pa dang
T02D2533:29a-26: / dad pas mngon du byed pas gnyis su med pa'i chos ye shes thob par byed pa'o //
T02D2533:29a-27: de nas yang sgom pa mchog tu mthar phyin pa
T02D2533:29a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang brnyes pa dgos pa'i
T02D2533:29a-29: dgos pa zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2533:29a-30: da ni tshig gi don yang bshad par bya ste /
T02D2533:29a-31: de nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ste /
T02D2533:29a-32: de ni gsol ba 'debs pa nyid kyi skabs su bab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:29a-33: 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba khri drug stong pa
T02D2533:29a-34: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi nang nas ting nge
T02D2533:29a-35: 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub
T02D2533:29a-36: pas gsungs pa / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye
T02D2533:29a-37: shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par
T02D2533:29a-38: brjod pa gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2533:29a-39: rje 'chang gis gsol ba 'debs pa yin no //
T02D2533:29a-40: dbang po rtul po'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i don du'o //
T02D2533:29a-41: yang na de nas zhes gsungs pa'i /
T02D2533:29a-42: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2533:29a-43: de nas rdo rje 'chang khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu /
T02D2533:29b-0: mgon po sangs rgyas @29b bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2533:29b-1: de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2533:29b-2: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas kyang //
T02D2533:29b-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyir na rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02D2533:29b-8: de gang la yod pa de ni dpal ldan no //
T02D2533:29b-9: 'dis ni rgya che ba gsungs pa'o //
T02D2533:29b-10: 'dis ci zhig ston par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2533:29b-11: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02D2533:29b-12: 'di nyid dpal bde mchog gi rgyud las gsungs pa ste /
T02D2533:29b-13: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02D2533:29b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2533:29b-16: sdug bsngal gyis 'dul ba ni gdul dka' ba ste /
T02D2533:29b-18: de dag rnams kyis 'dul ba ni ston pa ste /
T02D2533:29b-19: rdo rje 'dzin nyid kyis 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:29b-20: dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag rnams kyi nang
T02D2533:29b-21: na dam pa nyid pas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni
T02D2533:29b-22: mchog go // 'jig rten gsum zhes pa ni sa 'og gi 'jig rten dang /
T02D2533:29b-25: de rnams las rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'di la mnga' bas na 'jig rten gsum las rgyal lo //
T02D2533:29b-26: yang na rgyal bar byed pa dang /
T02D2533:29b-28: don thams cad grub par byed pa gsum ni 'jig rten gsum mo //
T02D2533:29b-29: de rnams las rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'di la mnga' bas na 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'o //
T02D2533:29b-30: de nyid kyi phyir na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de ni dpa' bo ste /
T02D2533:29b-31: gzhan gyi zil gyis mnan par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:29b-32: rdo rje dbang phyug ces pa ni /
T02D2533:29b-33: rdo rje ni rtse lnga pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2533:29b-34: de'i dbang phyug ni gtso bo ste /
T02D2533:29b-35: rdo rje dbang phyug ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2533:29b-36: dpal de nyid 'dus pa las gsang ba lnga brjod de /
T02D2533:29b-38: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin las //
T02D2533:29b-39: de lta de ltar sems can don //
T02D2533:29b-40: 'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya //
T02D2533:29b-41: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02D2533:29b-42: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyu yi phyir //
T02D2533:29b-43: sems can thams cad bsad na yang //
T02D2533:29b-44: de ni sdig gis mi gos so //
T02D2533:29b-45: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02D2533:29b-46: sangs rgyas sku dang sbyor ba las //
T02D2533:29b-47: gzhan gyi nor rnams 'phrog na yang /
T02D2533:30a-0: @30a * // de ni sdig gis mi gos so //
T02D2533:30a-1: 'dod chags lta bu'i bde ba med //
T02D2533:30a-2: de ni rgyal ba rnams la 'bul //
T02D2533:30a-3: sems can don du gzhan bud med //
T02D2533:30a-4: bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
T02D2533:30a-5: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02D2533:30a-6: sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyu yin phyir //
T02D2533:30a-7: las rnams thams cad byas pa yis //
T02D2533:30a-8: bsod nams rnam pa mang po brnyes //
T02D2533:30a-10: gsang ba lnga po de dag rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas gsang ba'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2533:30a-11: yang na gsang ba pa las rgyal ba'i phyir gsang ba'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2533:30a-12: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni /
T02D2533:30a-14: zhes pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i 'brel tshig kun la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2533:30a-15: padma dkar po zhes pa ni dkar po'i padma'o //
T02D2533:30a-16: rgyas pa ni kha bye ba'o //
T02D2533:30a-18: 'di'i tshig sbyar ba ni padma dkar po yang de
T02D2533:30a-19: yin la rgyas pa yang de yin pas padma dkar
T02D2533:30a-20: po rgyas pa'o // de 'dra ba'i spyan dang ldan
T02D2533:30a-21: pa gang yin pa de ni de skad ces gsungs
T02D2533:30a-22: po rgyas pa'o // so // padma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal //
T02D2533:30a-25: legs par kha bye ba ni rab tu rgyas pa'o //
T02D2533:30a-27: padma rab tu rgyas pa dang 'dra ba'i zhal dang
T02D2533:30a-28: ldan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2533:30a-29: gsungs so // rdo rje'i dbus nas lag pas bzung
T02D2533:30a-30: nas yang dang yang du rdo rje gyen du bsgyur
T02D2533:30a-32: rang gi lag gis rdo rje mchog //
T02D2533:30a-33: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa'o //
T02D2533:30a-34: 'di skad gsol to zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2533:30a-35: dpal phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2533:30a-36: dpal rdo rje 'chang gi rjes su spyod pa khro
T02D2533:30a-37: gnyer rim par ldan pa la sogs pa khro bo'i
T02D2533:30a-39: de rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2533:30a-40: rje 'dzin pas phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad gsol zhes
T02D2533:30a-42: khro bo'i tshigs de rnams kyang don mtha' yas pas de'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D2533:30a-43: lag na rdor je mtha' yas pa //
T02D2533:30a-45: rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du de rnams kyang gdul mtha' yas pa //
T02D2533:30a-47: rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du de rnams kyang gdul dka' ba 'dul pas de'i phyir gsungs pa //
T02D2533:30a-48: gdul dka' 'dul ba po zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:30a-49: de nyid kyi phyir dpa' bo ste /
T02D2533:30a-50: de de rnams kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:30a-51: de'i phyir gsungs pa dpa' bo zhes so //
T02D2533:30b-0: de nyid kyi phyir @30b gsungs pa /
T02D2533:30b-1: 'jigs su rung ba'i dpa' byang can //
T02D2533:30b-3: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //
T02D2533:30b-4: zhes pa ni rab tu 'phro ba'i rdo rje'i rtse mo ste /
T02D2533:30b-5: thog ma'i cha dang gang ldan pa de ni /
T02D2533:30b-6: rdo rje rtse mor ba 'phro ba //
T02D2533:30b-8: gsor byed pa zhes bya ba ni gyen du sgyur ba'o //
T02D2533:30b-11: de rnams kyi bdag nyid gang zhe na /
T02D2533:30b-12: snying rje che dang shes rab dang /
T02D2533:30b-13: thabs kyis 'gro ba rnams kyi don byed pa'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa yin pa de rnams ni /
T02D2533:30b-14: snying rje dang shes rab dang thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa ste /
T02D2533:30b-15: de la snying rje dang ldan pas snying rje'o //
T02D2533:30b-16: bde ba 'gog par byed pas snying rje ste /
T02D2533:30b-17: snying rje can ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug
T02D2533:30b-18: bsngal bas bdag gi bde ba 'gog pa ni snying
T02D2533:30b-19: rje'o // bdag gi bde ba mi 'phel bas na
T02D2533:30b-20: snying rje yang de yin la chen po yang de
T02D2533:30b-21: yin pas snying rje chen po ste /
T02D2533:30b-22: mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:30b-23: chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa ni shes rab bo //
T02D2533:30b-24: thabs ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ma lus pa'i
T02D2533:30b-25: ting nge 'dzin ston pa'i sgo nas skal pa ji
T02D2533:30b-26: lta bu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi don
T02D2533:30b-27: byed pa'o // 'gro bas 'gro ba ste khams gsum pa rnams so //
T02D2533:30b-28: de rnams kyi don ni dgos pa'o //
T02D2533:30b-30: snying rje che dang shes rab dang //
T02D2533:30b-31: thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog //
T02D2533:30b-33: de nyid kyi phyir na khro bo de rnams dam pa yin pas mchog ste /
T02D2533:30b-37: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2533:30b-38: de la dga' ba ni sems kyi bsam pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2533:30b-39: mgu ba ni lus kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:30b-42: dga' ba dang mgu ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa
T02D2533:30b-43: gang yin pa de rnams dga' mgu'i bsam pa can
T02D2533:30b-44: zhes bya'o // de nyid kyi phyir na rangs pa ni spro ba ste /
T02D2533:30b-45: sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:30b-48: lus kyi gzugs ni khro bo'i gzugs so //
T02D2533:30b-49: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ci 'dra zhe na /
T02D2533:30b-52: dbu dang phyag dang zhabs du ma dang /
T02D2533:30b-53: spyan mi sdug cing skra kham pa gyen du 'greng ba dang /
T02D2533:30b-55: khro gnyer dang thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan par byed pa dang /
T02D2533:31a-0: stag lpags kyi smad g-yogs la @31a * //
T02D2533:31a-1: sogs pa de rnams gang la yod pa de ni khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa ste /
T02D2533:31a-3: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
T02D2533:31a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las so //
T02D2533:31a-6: byed pa ni mdzad pa ste /
T02D2533:31a-8: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa zhes so //
T02D2533:31a-9: de nyid kyi phyir na mgon po ste /
T02D2533:31a-10: ston pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las byed pas na de bas na mgon zhes so //
T02D2533:31a-11: gang rnams kyis lus btud pa ni /
T02D2533:31a-13: lus btud pa de rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom
T02D2533:31a-14: ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di ltar 'og nas
T02D2533:31a-15: 'byung ba'i gsol zhes pa dang 'brel lo //
T02D2533:31a-20: mgon med pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams la rjes su ston pa'i phyir na gtso bo ni mgon po'o //
T02D2533:31a-21: mgon po yang ci 'dra ba'i mgon po yin zhe na /
T02D2533:31a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes so //
T02D2533:31a-24: de la de bzhin ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2533:31a-25: de mkhyen pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D2533:31a-26: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji ltar byon
T02D2533:31a-27: cing gshegs pa de bzhin du gshegs pas na de
T02D2533:31a-28: bzhin gshegs pa'o // ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2533:31a-29: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni skal pa phun sum tshogs pas na bcom ldan 'das sam /
T02D2533:31a-32: nyon mongs las dang de bzhin skye //
T02D2533:31a-33: de bzhin nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib //
T02D2533:31a-34: mi mthun phyogs chos gang yin pa //
T02D2533:31a-36: de ltar nges tshig gi rim pas nyon mongs pa
T02D2533:31a-37: la sogs pa 'joms pas ni bcom ldan 'das so
T02D2533:31a-38: // yang na dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
T02D2533:31a-40: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzangs dang //
T02D2533:31a-41: grags dang dpal dang rab mchog dang //
T02D2533:31a-42: de nas ye shes brtson 'grus dang //
T02D2533:31a-43: drug po rnams la ldan par bshad //
T02D2533:31a-44: gzhan yang mgon po ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2533:31a-45: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ni yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste /
T02D2533:31a-46: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:31a-47: phyag btsal nas zhes pa ni gong ma dang 'brel to /
T02D2533:31a-48: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni //
T02D2533:31a-49: spyan sngar 'dug pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2533:31a-50: 'dzin pas bdag la phan pa la sogs pa'i don
T02D2533:31b-1: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang /
T02D2533:31b-2: bdag la sman pa zhes pa ni bdag la phan pa ste /
T02D2533:31b-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag la sman pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:31b-4: bdag don ni bdag la dgos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:31b-5: bdag la ni bdag gi ste /
T02D2533:31b-6: kye khyab bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir te /
T02D2533:31b-7: phan gdags pa'i phyir rim pa ji lta ba 'dis bdag gis thob par mdzod cig pa'o //
T02D2533:31b-8: gang gis thob par bya zhe na /
T02D2533:31b-10: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i //
T02D2533:31b-11: byang chub ci nas bdag thob pa ni sgyu 'phrul
T02D2533:31b-12: dra ba'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes
T02D2533:31b-13: bya ba'i rim pa de ci nas kyang bdag gis
T02D2533:31b-14: thob par 'gyur ba de ltar kye bcom ldan 'das
T02D2533:31b-15: bshad du gsol zhes phyis 'byung ba'i byed pa'i tshig
T02D2533:31b-16: dang 'brel to // sems can de rnams ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2533:31b-17: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
T02D2533:31b-18: zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa drug go //
T02D2533:31b-19: de skad mngon pa'i chos las gsungs te /
T02D2533:31b-20: nga rgyal lta ba the tshom dang //
T02D2533:31b-21: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug go //
T02D2533:31b-23: nyon mongs pa de rnams kyis sems rnam par dkrugs
T02D2533:31b-24: pa'i sems can gang yin pa de rnams ni nyon
T02D2533:31b-25: mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing ste /
T02D2533:31b-26: de'i phyir na de rnams bla na med pa'i 'bras
T02D2533:31b-27: bu thob pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
T02D2533:31b-28: du gsol zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2533:31b-29: gzhan yang khyad par ci 'dra ba'i sems can zhe na /
T02D2533:31b-30: mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi //
T02D2533:31b-31: sems can kun la sman pa dang //
T02D2533:31b-33: de la mi shes pa ni ma rig pa ste /
T02D2533:31b-34: de nyid thogs pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir ram /
T02D2533:31b-35: thar dka' bas na 'dam dang 'dra bas 'dam mo //
T02D2533:31b-36: der bying ba'i sems can gang yin pa rnams la
T02D2533:31b-37: phan pa'i phyir bshad du gsol zhes pa'i tshig dang
T02D2533:31b-38: 'brel to // bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2533:31b-39: zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D2533:31b-40: de thob pa ni rab tu rnyed pa'o //
T02D2533:31b-41: de'i don ni de thob pa'i phyir zhes bya'o //
T02D2533:31b-42: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol //
T02D2533:31b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2533:31b-44: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ni rtag pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2533:31b-45: 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi bla ma pas 'gro ba'i bla ma ste /
T02D2533:31b-46: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:31b-47: ston pa zhes pa ni 'gro ba la rjes su ston pa ste /
T02D2533:32a-0: @32a * // mi bskyod pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2533:32a-1: dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2533:32a-2: chen po yang de yin la dam tshig kyang de yin pas dam tshig chen po'o //
T02D2533:32a-3: de'i de nyid ni dam tshig chen po de nyid do //
T02D2533:32a-5: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //
T02D2533:32a-7: snang ba mtha' yas kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:32a-8: dbang po zhes pa ni rtul po dang 'bring po dang rnon po rnams te /
T02D2533:32a-9: de rnams kyi bsam pa ni mno bsam mo //
T02D2533:32a-11: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:32a-12: don yod grub pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2533:32a-13: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid las
T02D2533:32a-14: bcom ldan 'das ni dam pa yin pas mchog ste
T02D2533:32a-15: / bshad du gsol zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2533:32a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
T02D2533:32a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2533:32a-19: kye bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'
T02D2533:32a-20: dang 'brel pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gang
T02D2533:32a-21: yin pa de bdag gis gzung ngo zhes phyi nas
T02D2533:32a-23: khyad par ci 'dra ba zhig ye shes sku zhe na /
T02D2533:32a-24: ye shes kyi sku yin pas ye shes sku ste /
T02D2533:32a-26: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:32a-27: gtsug tor chen po zhes pa ni chen po'i gtsug ni gtsug tor chen po ste /
T02D2533:32a-29: / de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:32a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i bdag nyid kyi phyir gtsug tor chen po'o //
T02D2533:32a-31: tshig gi bdag po zhes pa ni tshig ni sgra'o //
T02D2533:32a-32: bdag po ni mnga' bdag ste tshig gi bdag po de'o //
T02D2533:32a-33: tshig gi bdag po ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:32a-34: ye shes sku zhes pa ni ye shes nyid sku yin pas na ye shes sku'o //
T02D2533:32a-35: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:32a-36: rang byung zhes pa ni rang byung ba rang byung ste /
T02D2533:32a-37: bsgoms pa'i stobs las byung zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2533:32a-38: de skad du yang dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D2533:32a-39: kun du bzang po ye shes kyi //
T02D2533:32a-40: bdag nyid mngon par byang chub po /
T02D2533:32a-42: de'i phyir na de nyid rang 'byung zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:32a-43: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:32a-44: des ci gsungs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2533:32b-0: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ye shes lnga dang @32b ldan pa bstan to //
T02D2533:32b-1: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhes pa ni /
T02D2533:32b-3: dpal dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2533:32b-4: ye shes sems dpa' zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2533:32b-5: pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i phyir
T02D2533:32b-6: ro // 'jam dpal yang de yin la ye shes
T02D2533:32b-7: sems dpa' yang de nyid yin pas 'jam dpal ye
T02D2533:32b-9: de sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no //
T02D2533:32b-10: de lta na de su zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2533:32b-11: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes shes rab kyi pha
T02D2533:32b-12: rol tu phyin pa de nyid 'jam dpal ye shes
T02D2533:32b-13: sems dpa' ste / de nyid kyi phyir na phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs pa /
T02D2533:32b-14: shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis med //
T02D2533:32b-15: ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2533:32b-17: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid 'jam dpal ye shes sems
T02D2533:32b-18: dpa' dang 'brel pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
T02D2533:32b-19: de bdag gis gzung ngo zhes pa dang 'brel lo
T02D2533:32b-20: // khyad par ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
T02D2533:32b-22: mtshan ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog / cas bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2533:32b-23: de'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2533:32b-24: don zab ces pa ni zab mo yang de yin
T02D2533:32b-25: la don yang de nyid yin pas na don zab
T02D2533:32b-26: ste / stong pa nyid kyi don to //
T02D2533:32b-27: de la don dang zab pa yod pa de'i phyir bdag gis gzung zhes pa'o //
T02D2533:32b-28: don ni rgya che zhing zhes pa ni rab tu rgyas pa'i don to //
T02D2533:32b-29: de gang la yod pa de ni don ni rgya che zhing zhes so //
T02D2533:32b-30: don chen zhes pa ni che ba'i don gang yin pa de ni don chen po nyid de /
T02D2533:32b-31: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:32b-32: mtshungs med ces pa ni mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mtshungs med do //
T02D2533:32b-33: gang gi phyir mtshungs pa med pa yin zhe na /
T02D2533:32b-34: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:32b-35: rab zhi zhes pa ni spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:32b-36: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
T02D2533:32b-37: zhes pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang /
T02D2533:32b-38: sgom pa dus rnams la spro ba dang dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa thob pa'i phyir te /
T02D2533:32b-39: dge ba gsum po de bdag gis gzung ngo zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2533:32b-40: khyad par gzhan yang ci 'dra ba zhe na /
T02D2533:32b-42: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D2533:32b-43: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2533:33a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang gsungs pa dang /
T02D2533:33a-2: ma 'ongs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2533:33a-3: rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang
T02D2533:33a-4: / yang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2533:33a-5: 'das rnams yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang yin
T02D2533:33a-6: / pa'i zhes bya'o // des 'di skad gsung par 'gyur te /
T02D2533:33a-7: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mtshan
T02D2533:33a-8: yang dag par brjod pa gsungs pa de'i phyir chos
T02D2533:33a-9: kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar
T02D2533:33a-11: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D2533:33a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung
T02D2533:33a-13: yang rung chos nyid ni kun du gnas pa'o zhes
T02D2533:33a-16: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02D2533:33a-17: zhes pa la sogs pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
T02D2533:33a-18: rgyud chen po 'di la dpag tu med pa'i rdo
T02D2533:33a-19: rje 'dzin pa chen pos gsang sngags chen po 'dzin
T02D2533:33a-20: pa rnams dga' nas yang dag par glu blangs pa
T02D2533:33a-21: gang yin pa de bdag gis gzung zhes pa dang
T02D2533:33a-22: 'brel lo // mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi //
T02D2533:33a-23: zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D2533:33a-24: kye mgon po ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs pa'i
T02D2533:33a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'dzin par bdag 'gyur
T02D2533:33a-26: ba de bzhin du bshad par gsol zhes gong ma
T02D2533:33a-27: dang 'brel to // 'dzin zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi skad do //
T02D2533:33a-29: bdag gis bsam pa brtan pos gzung //
T02D2533:33a-30: zhes pa ni bdag gis mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2533:33a-31: pa 'di'i nges par 'byung ba ma thob kyi bar
T02D2533:33a-32: du gzung ngo // nges par 'byung zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2533:33a-35: bsam pa ni mno bsam mo //
T02D2533:33a-36: brtan po ni mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D2533:33a-37: de dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam pa brtan pa'o //
T02D2533:33a-38: ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gis de rtogs nas
T02D2533:33a-39: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par ji
T02D2533:33a-40: lta ba bzhin du bshad par 'tshal lo zhes 'og
T02D2533:33a-42: gang gi don du zhe na /
T02D2533:33a-44: nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang //
T02D2533:33a-45: mi shes ma lus spangs pa'i phyir //
T02D2533:33a-47: de la nyon mongs pa ma lus pa ni nyon
T02D2533:33a-48: mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzung ngo
T02D2533:33a-49: // de rnams zad pa'i don ni nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba'o //
T02D2533:33a-50: ma lus pa'i dngos po mi shes pa ni mi shes ma lus te //
T02D2533:33a-51: de gzhom par bya ba ni mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir te /
T02D2533:33a-52: de yi don du bshad par 'tshal //
T02D2533:33b-1: bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
T02D2533:33b-2: sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal //
T02D2533:33b-3: zhes pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gis
T02D2533:33b-4: rtogs nas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad
T02D2533:33b-5: par ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gis rab tu
T02D2533:33b-6: bshad par 'tshal lo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2533:33b-7: gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis //
T02D2533:33b-9: de la gsang ba ni lcang lo can gyi pho
T02D2533:33b-10: brang zhes bya ba la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams
T02D2533:33b-11: so // de rnams kyi rgyal po'i phyir na gsang dbang zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:33b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de skad du //
T02D2533:33b-13: zhes pa ni de skad de rnam pa 'di lta
T02D2533:33b-14: bus bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po lag na
T02D2533:33b-15: rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol to //
T02D2533:33b-16: gsol nas ji ltar byas she na /
T02D2533:33b-17: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni //
T02D2533:33b-18: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug / ces pa ni lus btud nas spyan sngar gnas zhes so //
T02D2533:33b-19: bkur ba sngon du byas nas don du gnyer ba ni gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
T02D2533:33b-20: bkur ba ni phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2533:33b-21: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher
T02D2533:33b-22: 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par
T02D2533:33b-23: lta ba zhes pa las zhus pa'i rim par phye
T02D2533:33b-24: ba dang po ste tshigs bcad bcu drug go /
T02D2533:33b-26: // / de nas zhus pa'i de ma thag tu gsungs pa /
T02D2533:33b-27: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
T02D2533:33b-28: ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2533:33b-29: de la de nas ni zhus pa'i de ma thag tu slar gsungs pa'o //
T02D2533:33b-30: bcom ldan 'das ni bshad zin to //
T02D2533:33b-31: sh'akya'i rigs rnams kyi thub pa ni sh'akya thub pa'o //
T02D2533:33b-32: sku gsung thugs thub pas na yang thub pa'o //
T02D2533:33b-33: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog / ces pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni bshad zin to //
T02D2533:33b-34: rkang gnyis ni lha dang mi'o //
T02D2533:33b-35: de rnams kyi mchog ni rab ces pa'i don to //
T02D2533:33b-36: nyid kyi zhal nas zhes pa ni sh'akya thub pa nyid kyi zhal nas so //
T02D2533:33b-37: ljags bzang ba ni g-yas su 'khyil pa'i dung dang
T02D2533:33b-38: 'dra zhing chos thams cad kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir
T02D2533:33b-39: ro // ring zhing yangs par brkyang mdzad de //
T02D2533:33b-40: zhes pa ni rang gi zhal nas ring zhing yangs
T02D2533:33b-41: pa'i rang gi lce sprul pa mdzad nas bsdus pa'i
T02D2533:33b-42: phyir ro // ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2533:33b-43: 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing //
T02D2533:33b-44: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2533:33b-45: sa 'og dang sa stengs dang sa bla'i 'jig rten
T02D2533:33b-46: gsum la snang zhing gsal bar byed pa'i 'dzum pa
T02D2533:33b-47: bstan nas phyag na rdo rje la slar gsungs so
T02D2533:34a-3: bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa //
T02D2533:34a-4: zhes pa bdud bzhi ni phung po dang /
T02D2533:34a-8: de rnams nyid dgra rnams te /
T02D2533:34a-9: de rnams 'dul ba ni rjes su mthun par 'dul
T02D2533:34a-10: zhing tshar gtsod pa'i 'dzum pa bstan nas phyag na
T02D2533:34a-11: rdo rje la slar gsungs so zhes pa dang 'brel
T02D2533:34a-12: to // sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum //
T02D2533:34a-13: sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas //
T02D2533:34a-14: zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i sems can ngan song
T02D2533:34a-15: gsum gyi dmyal ba dang yi dags dang dud 'gro'o
T02D2533:34a-16: // de dag par sbyang par byed pa'i 'dzum bstan
T02D2533:34a-17: te phyag na rdo rje la slar gsungs zhes pa
T02D2533:34a-18: // dang 'brel to // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos bstan pa'i dus na rtags gsum ste /
T02D2533:34a-25: kha cig tu gsum du 'gyur te /
T02D2533:34a-27: dpal sgyu 'phrul dra pa'i rgyud las gnyis gsungs te /
T02D2533:34a-29: kha cig las gsum la 'di lta ste /
T02D2533:34a-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
T02D2533:34a-31: byams pa la gzigs pa dang /
T02D2533:34a-34: kha cig las gcig ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2533:34a-35: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gnyis las so //
T02D2533:34a-36: 'dzum pa bstan nas zhes pa ni //
T02D2533:34a-37: 'dzum pa de ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2533:34a-38: yan lag dang nyid lag las 'phro ba dang /
T02D2533:34a-41: ljags kyi dbang po las 'od 'phro ba ste /
T02D2533:34a-42: 'dir ni ljags kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul bstan pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rtags so //
T02D2533:34a-44: tshangs pa'i gsung zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:34a-45: tshangs pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i phyir changs pa'i gsung ngo //
T02D2533:34a-46: tshangs pa'i sgra ni che ba dang /
T02D2533:34a-47: yon tan che ba'i tshig bla dags te /
T02D2533:34a-49: tshangs ldan bsod nams rab skye ba'o ;
T02D2533:34a-51: stong phrag du ma rnams las te /
T02D2533:34a-52: stong phrag gi sgra ni stong gsum gyi stong chen
T02D2533:34a-53: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la shes par bya ste
T02D2533:34a-54: / stong phrag du ma'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor zhes ston to //
T02D2533:34b-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams @34b sgras gang bar byed do zhes so //
T02D2533:34b-1: ji ltar nang na thos pa de bzhin du phyi rol na yang shes te /
T02D2533:34b-2: de la nang gang yin pa de ni stong gsum
T02D2533:34b-3: gyi stong chen po 'di la gnas pa rnams so
T02D2533:34b-4: // phyi rol ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan yang yin pa rnams te /
T02D2533:34b-5: de bas na che ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i gsung ngo //
T02D2533:34b-6: yang na tshangs pa na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'o //
T02D2533:34b-7: tshangs pa de'i tshig 'di nyid tshangs ba'i gsung ngo //
T02D2533:34b-8: snyan pa yis zhes pa ni mnyan na bde ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:34b-9: 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas //
T02D2533:34b-10: zhes pa ni de'i las tshangs pa'i gsung gcig kho
T02D2533:34b-11: nas 'jig rten gsum rnam par khyab pa'i gsung gis
T02D2533:34b-12: phyag na rdo rje la slar gsungs pa dang 'brel
T02D2533:34b-13: to // de skad du gsungs pa /
T02D2533:34b-14: srid pa 'joms pa'i gsung ni gcig po yang //
T02D2533:34b-15: theg pa sna tshogs rab bstan phye ba yis //
T02D2533:34b-16: ji lta ji ltar skye bo thams cad kyis //
T02D2533:34b-17: rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur skyon med rnam par gsal //
T02D2533:34b-19: snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas //
T02D2533:34b-20: zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D2533:34b-21: lag na rdo rje khyod legs so //
T02D2533:34b-22: khye dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang gang dang gang gi
T02D2533:34b-23: phyir khyod 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku dang
T02D2533:34b-24: 'brel pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gang yin
T02D2533:34b-25: pa de nga las nyan par brtson pa de dang
T02D2533:34b-26: de'i phyir gsang ba'i bdag po la legs par bstan
T02D2533:34b-27: par bya zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2533:34b-28: khyod kyis ci'i don du nga las dris pa yin zhe na /
T02D2533:34b-29: 'gro la phan pa'i don du ni //
T02D2533:34b-31: 'gro ba la nye bar phan gdags pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur pas so //
T02D2533:34b-32: khyad par ji lta bu'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyan par brtson zhe na /
T02D2533:34b-33: dag par byed cing sdig sel ba //
T02D2533:34b-35: de la dag par byed cing zhes pa ni bkra shis pa'o //
T02D2533:34b-36: sdig sel ba zhes pa ni mi dge ba 'joms pa'o //
T02D2533:34b-37: khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
T02D2533:34b-38: zhes pa ni de yis 'di skad gsungs par 'gyur te /
T02D2533:34b-39: bum pa kha bub pa dang /
T02D2533:34b-40: bum pa zhabs rdol ba dang /
T02D2533:34b-41: bum pa mi gtsang ba bzhin du mi rung ngo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2533:34b-43: legs par nyon cig ces pa'o //
T02D2533:34b-44: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsungs ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa /
T02D2533:34b-45: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol //
T02D2533:34b-46: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das ni sh'akya thub pa'o //
T02D2533:34b-47: de ni de ltar mnyan par bgyi'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2533:35a-1: zhes pa ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid kyi rim
T02D2533:35a-2: pas bdag gis mnyan to zhes pa'i tha tshig go
T02D2533:35a-3: // 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya
T02D2533:35a-4: cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam
T02D2533:35a-5: par lta ba zhes bya ba las slar gsungs pa'i
T02D2533:35a-6: rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa tshigs bcad drug
T02D2533:35a-8: / da ni slar gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu
T02D2533:35a-9: rigs drug la gzigs pa'i rim par phye ba gsungs
T02D2533:35a-10: pa / de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
T02D2533:35a-11: ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2533:35a-13: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang //
T02D2533:35a-14: zhes pa ni sdud par byed pa'i tshig 'di ni spyir bstan pa'o ;
T02D2533:35a-15: /'dir de dang de la rnam par gzigs te /
T02D2533:35a-16: tshig gi bdag po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'
T02D2533:35a-17: dang 'brel pa'i skye ba med pa'i chos can tshigs
T02D2533:35a-18: su bcad pa 'di gsungs so zhes phyis 'byung ba'i
T02D2533:35a-19: tshig dang lhan cig tu 'brel to //
T02D2533:35a-20: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
T02D2533:35a-21: zhes pa ni rig sngags 'dzin pas na rig sngags 'chang ba'o //
T02D2533:35a-22: gsang sngags kyi bdag nyid kyang de yin la rig
T02D2533:35a-23: sngags 'chang ba yang de nyid yin pas na gsang
T02D2533:35a-24: sngags rig sngags 'chang ba ni 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2533:35a-25: do // de'i rigs ni gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs te /
T02D2533:35a-26: las kyi rigs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2533:35a-27: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
T02D2533:35a-28: zhes pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rang
T02D2533:35a-29: bzhin nyid pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs zhes
T02D2533:35a-30: pa'i don to // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs //
T02D2533:35a-31: zhes pa ni 'jig rten la lta bas na 'jig rten no //
T02D2533:35a-32: de'i rigs ni 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs te /
T02D2533:35a-33: padma'i rigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2533:35a-34: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang //
T02D2533:35a-35: zhes pa ni 'jig rten rnams la gsal bar byed
T02D2533:35a-36: pa ni 'jig rten snang byed de me long lta
T02D2533:35a-37: bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid pas mi bskyod pa'o
T02D2533:35a-39: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang //
T02D2533:35a-42: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang //
T02D2533:35a-43: zhes pa ni byang sems rdo rje'i rigs so //
T02D2533:35a-44: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog ste /
T02D2533:35a-45: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:35a-46: de'i rigs ni phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog go //
T02D2533:35a-47: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
T02D2533:35b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khams gsum gyi
T02D2533:35b-2: rgyal por dbang bskur bas na gtsug tor chen po
T02D2533:35b-3: ste / de'i rigs ni rigs chen gtsug tor che ste /
T02D2533:35b-4: rin po che'i rigs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2533:35b-5: chen gzigs pa'i don ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D2533:35b-6: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher
T02D2533:35b-7: 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par
T02D2533:35b-8: lta ba zhes bya ba las rigs drug la gzigs
T02D2533:35b-9: pa'i rim par phye ba ste gsum pa tshigs bcad
T02D2533:35b-11: / da ni dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon par
T02D2533:35b-12: rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa bla ma gcig
T02D2533:35b-13: nas gcig tu brgyud pa bshad de ;
T02D2533:35b-14: de yang dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u khri drug stong gi nang nas byung ba yin no //
T02D2533:35b-15: de la dang por re zhig sngags kyi sgor zhugs nas spyad pa spyod pas /
T02D2533:35b-16: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de
T02D2533:35b-17: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyi
T02D2533:35b-18: gtsug gnyis su med pa don dam pa'i mtshan yang
T02D2533:35b-19: dag par brjod pa zhes pa gtsug gi nor bu
T02D2533:35b-20: 'di mngon du byed 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2533:35b-21: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi
T02D2533:35b-22: khams thams cad yongs su sgrol ba'i bsam pa dang
T02D2533:35b-23: / byang chub chen por smon pa'i sems dang /
T02D2533:35b-24: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid dang ldan pas
T02D2533:35b-25: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdus te
T02D2533:35b-26: / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2533:35b-28: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2533:35b-29: bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba dus 'di nas
T02D2533:35b-30: gzung nas ji tsam byang chub kyi snying po la
T02D2533:35b-31: gnas kyi bar du bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D2533:35b-32: mchog gi sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D2533:35b-33: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2533:35b-34: byang chub nyid du nges pa'i //
T02D2533:35b-35: byang chub sems ni bla na med pa //
T02D2533:35b-36: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2533:35b-37: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D2533:35b-38: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2533:35b-39: sems can don byed tshul khrims rnams //
T02D2533:35b-40: brtan por bdag gis so sor gzung //
T02D2533:35b-41: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D2533:35b-42: bla med mchog gi dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2533:35b-43: deng brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2533:35b-44: nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo //
T02D2533:35b-45: sdom pa sangs rgyas sbyor bskyed pa //
T02D2533:36a-2: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2533:36a-3: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag / de nyid kho nas so sor gzung //
T02D2533:36a-4: slob dpon yang ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2533:36a-5: drug tu byas te nyin re la //
T02D2533:36a-6: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02D2533:36a-7: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2533:36a-8: yid dga' ba yi dam tshig go //
T02D2533:36a-9: phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D2533:36a-10: dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2533:36a-11: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa yi //
T02D2533:36a-12: byang chub chen po las byung ba'o //
T02D2533:36a-13: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2533:36a-14: sdom pa thams cad rab ldan pa //
T02D2533:36a-15: so sor yang dag gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2533:36a-16: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2533:36a-17: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la'o //
T02D2533:36a-18: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D2533:36a-19: bskyed par byas te bdag gis ni //
T02D2533:36a-20: sems can kun gyi don du ni //
T02D2533:36a-21: sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2533:36a-22: ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2533:36a-23: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D2533:36a-24: dbugs ma byung ba dbugs dbyung ste //
T02D2533:36a-25: mya ngan 'das la sems can dgod //
T02D2533:36a-26: sdom pa gzung ba sngon du 'gro bas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste //
T02D2533:36a-27: mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pa 'dis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2533:36a-28: dang por re zhig me long lta bu'i ye shes
T02D2533:36a-29: kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bya ste
T02D2533:36a-30: / ji ltar yongs su dag pa'i me long gi
T02D2533:36a-31: dkyil 'khor la de'i drung gi yul dang dus kyi
T02D2533:36a-32: dngos po'i rig pa rnams so sor snang ba de
T02D2533:36a-33: ltar shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings
T02D2533:36a-34: kyi rgyu mthun pa byang chub kyi sems chen po
T02D2533:36a-35: la 'gro ba dang yul dang skye gnas kyi dbye
T02D2533:36a-36: bas phye ba'i sems can gyi khams snang ste /
T02D2533:36a-37: de rnams shin tu dri ma med pa'i me long
T02D2533:36a-38: lta bu'i ye shes de la yang bltas te de'i
T02D2533:36a-39: phyi nas sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje bskyed
T02D2533:36a-40: par bya ste / ae ma'o sems can 'di rnams mgon med pa /
T02D2533:36a-42: dpung gnyen med pas sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba'i
T02D2533:36a-43: rgya mtshor bying ba de rnams kyi don du ji
T02D2533:36a-44: ltar bdag nyid ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du
T02D2533:36a-45: sdug bsngal las bsgral bar bya ste /
T02D2533:36a-46: ji ltar zug rdu can gyi sems can thams cad
T02D2533:36a-47: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sems can rnams
T02D2533:36a-48: kun rdzob tu snang bar bya'o //
T02D2533:36a-49: de nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mos par byas te /
T02D2533:36a-50: chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid du sbyor bas /
T02D2533:36b-0: ji ltar chos rnams stong @36b pa dang bdag med
T02D2533:36b-1: pa de ltar bdag kyang stong pa dang bdag med
T02D2533:36b-3: chos thams cad bdag med pa la gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2533:36b-5: bdag ci 'dra ba de 'drar sems can thams cad shes //
T02D2533:36b-6: sems can thams cad ci 'dra de 'drar chos kun shes //
T02D2533:36b-8: / de nas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i rang
T02D2533:36b-9: bzhin du rtogs pas chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje
T02D2533:36b-10: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bskyed par bya'o
T02D2533:36b-11: // de nas aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata ces sngags brjod nas //
T02D2533:36b-12: ma lus par ni mdor bsdus te //
T02D2533:36b-13: sngags pa sngags don bsgoms nas su //
T02D2533:36b-14: dmigs pa med dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2533:36b-15: chos bdag med pa rnam par bsgom //
T02D2533:36b-16: de ltar so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D2533:36b-17: de lta bu'i de ma thag pa nyid du dmigs
T02D2533:36b-18: pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i rjes su song
T02D2533:36b-19: ba / gzung 'dzin kun las rnam par grol ba /
T02D2533:36b-21: cha shas kyi rang bzhin las 'das pa /
T02D2533:36b-22: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2533:36b-23: de nas yang sems can thams cad kyi don byed
T02D2533:36b-24: pa dang bral bas na rnal 'byor pas sngon gyi
T02D2533:36b-25: smon lam gyis bsgoms pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyi dbang
T02D2533:36b-26: gis langs te / mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen
T02D2533:36b-27: pos bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mngon du
T02D2533:36b-28: gis langs te / bya'o // rnam par mi rtog
T02D2533:36b-29: pa'i ye shes kyi rjes la thob pa dag pa
T02D2533:36b-30: 'jig rten pa'i ye shes nyid kyi phyir de'i de
T02D2533:36b-31: nyid kyis sems can gyi don thams cad yongs su
T02D2533:36b-33: de'ang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems
T02D2533:36b-34: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam
T02D2533:36b-35: par byang ba'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya bar
T02D2533:36b-36: rig par bya'o // de nas rnal 'byor pas sems
T02D2533:36b-37: nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas
T02D2533:36b-38: pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba skar ma'i rnam
T02D2533:36b-40: de las byung ba khro bo 'bar ba'i phreng bas
T02D2533:36b-41: 'khrigs pa sngon po mdog du ma'i 'od zer brgya
T02D2533:36b-42: stong gis yongs su bskor ba ming gzhan kun du

T02D2533:43a-36: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //

T02D2533:43b-52: shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba yang de yin la

T02D2533:44a-1: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02D2533:44a-2: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //

T02D2533:44a-4: lcags kyu dang 'dra bas lcags kyu ste /
T02D2533:44a-5: nyon mongs pa la dbang thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:44a-6: nyon mongs pa'i lcags kyu yang de nyid yin la

T02D2533:44a-10: grags chen snyan grags chen po ni rdo rje rgyu ste /

T02D2533:44a-21: dang gang ldan pa de ni snang ba chen po'o

T02D2533:45a-34: khrims ni mnyam par gzhag pa'o zhes pa'i skad kyi

T02D2533:45b-28: bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas ni rdo rje me tog ma'o //

T02D2533:45b-35: smon par byed pas na smon lam ste /

T02D2533:62a-38: rnam par snang mdzad rnams ni sangs rgyas lnga'o //
T02D2533:62a-39: de nyid kyi bdag nyid dang de'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D2533:62a-40: dbu rgyan dang gang ldan pa de ni sangs rgyas
T02D2533:62a-41: lnga bdag dbu rgyan can no //
T02D2533:62b-3: sangs rgyas kyi spyan rnams gang la mnga' ba de ni spyan lnga'o //
T02D2533:62b-4: de nyid kyi phyir na chags pa med pa 'chang ste /
T02D2533:62b-5: shes bya thams cad la chags pa med pa dang /
T02D2533:62b-6: thogs pa med la 'khrul pa med par gzigs pa
T02D2533:62b-7: gang yin pa de ni chags pa med pa gzigs
T02D2533:62b-8: pa'o // de ltar chos mngon pa las gsungs pa /
T02D2533:62b-9: dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis //
T02D2533:62b-10: stong gnyis gnyis dang grangs med mthong //
T02D2533:62b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
T02D2533:62b-13: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog / ces pa ni /
T02D2533:62b-14: de la sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po ni 'byung ba po ste /
T02D2533:62b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:62b-16: de ltar yang de nyid 'dus pa las gsungs pa /
T02D2533:62b-18: de bzhin gshegs rnams khyod la brten //
T02D2533:62b-20: sangs rgyas sras po ni sgrib pa'i bag chags thams
T02D2533:62b-21: cad las rnam par grol ba rnam pa thams cad
T02D2533:62b-22: du chos thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T02D2533:62b-23: sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa'i dngos
T02D2533:62b-24: po rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2533:62b-25: khyad par ni sangs rgyas te /
T02D2533:62b-26: de'i sras po ni sangs rgyas sras po ste /
T02D2533:62b-27: sras ni bdag las skyes pas so //
T02D2533:62b-28: de'ang bdag nyid ni don dam par de bzhin nyid las rab tu byung ba'am /
T02D2533:62b-29: rtog pa med pa'i ye shes so sor rtog pa las byung bas na sangs rgyas su bshad de /
T02D2533:62b-30: don des byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas sras zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:62b-31: dam pa ni rab nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:62b-32: mchog ni mngon par 'gro bar bya ba rnams kyi nang na ma nor ba mchog nyid do //
T02D2533:62b-33: shes rab srid 'byung skye gnas nyid //
T02D2533:62b-34: chos kyi 'byung gnas srid pa sel //
T02D2533:62b-36: de la shes rab ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ste /
T02D2533:62b-37: de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang gang zag gnyis kyis rnam par dben pa'o //
T02D2533:62b-38: shes rab srid pa ni dag pa'i phung po lnga ste /
T02D2533:62b-43: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rnams so //
T02D2533:62b-44: de rnams las 'byung ba ni shes rab srid 'byung zhes bcom ldan 'das la gsungs so //
T02D2533:63a-2: skye ba dang ldan zhing bsgrub bya dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi skyed byed de /
T02D2533:63a-3: chos rnams 'byung ba zhes pa la /
T02D2533:63a-4: chos rnams kyi skye gnas ni chos kyi 'byung gnas te /
T02D2533:63a-5: chos ni zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams so //
T02D2533:63a-6: de rnams kyi 'byung ba'i gnas ni rgyu zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2533:63a-7: srid pa sel ni srid pa ni 'khor ba ste /
T02D2533:63a-8: de mthar byed pa ni srid mthar byed do //
T02D2533:63a-9: gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag / ces pa ni /
T02D2533:63a-10: de la gcig pu sra mkhregs ni gcig pu sra
T02D2533:63a-11: ba yang de yin la mkhregs pa yang de yin
T02D2533:63a-12: pas gcig pu sra mkhregs so //
T02D2533:63a-13: sra ba ni brtan pa ste bar chad med pa de nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:63a-14: mkhregs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dri ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:63a-15: de nyid kyi phyir na rdo rje'i bdag ces pa ste /
T02D2533:63a-16: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:63a-17: de'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gang dang ldan pa de rdo rje'i bdag ste /
T02D2533:63a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:63a-19: skyes ma thag ni gang dang gang du sems can
T02D2533:63a-20: gyi don mthong ba de dang der skad cig nyid
T02D2533:63a-21: la skye ba yongs su bzhes pa'i phyir na skyes
T02D2533:63a-23: skye ba la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:63a-24: 'gro ba'i bdag ni 'gro ba rnams kyi bdag po ni 'gro ba'i bdag ste /
T02D2533:63a-25: 'gro ba'i rje bo zhes pa'i don te /
T02D2533:63a-26: de rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rten yin pa'i phyir na /
T02D2533:63a-27: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02D2533:63a-28: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D2533:63a-30: de la nam mkha' las byung ba ni nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02D2533:63a-31: de las byung bas nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
T02D2533:63a-32: rang byung ni rang byung bas na rang byung ste /
T02D2533:63a-33: byang chub sems rdo rje'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:63a-34: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D2533:63a-36: shes rab ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid ni shes rab ye shes te ;
T02D2533:63a-37: rtog pa med pa'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D2533:63a-38: de nyid me ste bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon
T02D2533:63a-39: mongs pa'i bud shing sreg par nus pa nyid kyi
T02D2533:63a-40: phyir ro // che zhes pa ni sa dang /
T02D2533:63b-0: zla ba zhes pa brgyad kyi spyi @63b gzugs nyid pas chen po'o //
T02D2533:63b-7: yon tan drug dang ldan pas so //
T02D2533:63b-8: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
T02D2533:63b-9: ye shes skar ma lam me ba //
T02D2533:63b-11: de la 'od chen ni cher gsal bar byed pas na 'od chen te /
T02D2533:63b-12: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas te /
T02D2533:63b-13: 'od ni shes bya gsal bar byed pas chos mthun pa'o //
T02D2533:63b-14: rnam par snang bar byed pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2533:63b-15: ye shes skar ma ni gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir
T02D2533:63b-16: na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de'i skar ma
T02D2533:63b-17: ni ye shes skar ma zhes bya ste /
T02D2533:63b-18: me long lta bu'i ya shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:63b-19: lam me ba ni gsal zhing lam me ba ste /
T02D2533:63b-20: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus 'gro ba kun gyi don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:63b-21: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
T02D2533:63b-22: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02D2533:63b-24: de la 'gro ba'i mar me ni 'gro ba rnams
T02D2533:63b-25: kyi mar me dang 'dra bas 'gro ba'i mar me
T02D2533:63b-26: ste / so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:63b-27: ye shes sgron me zhes pa ni ye shes kyi
T02D2533:63b-28: sgron me'i 'od dang ldan pa de ni ye shes
T02D2533:63b-29: sgron te / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2533:63b-30: gzi brjid chen po ni gzi brjid chen po'i 'od
T02D2533:63b-31: dang gang ldan pa de gzi brjid chen po ste
T02D2533:63b-32: / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:63b-33: 'od gsal ba ni phul du byung bas rab tu gsal ba ste /
T02D2533:63b-34: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:63b-35: kun nas snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal yin no //
T02D2533:63b-36: sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02D2533:63b-37: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02D2533:63b-39: de la sngags mchog mnga' bdag ni sngags kyang de
T02D2533:63b-40: yin la mchog kyang de yin pas na sngags mchog
T02D2533:63b-41: ste / de'i bdag ni gtso bo ste /
T02D2533:63b-42: 'dir sngags mchog mnga' bdag ni yi ge h'um las shes par bya'o //
T02D2533:63b-43: de'i phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:63b-44: rig sngags rgyal ni rig sngags rnams kyi rgyal po ni rig rgyal te /
T02D2533:63b-45: thams cad du rig sngags te gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2533:63b-46: du gyur pa rnams kyis skyed pa po yin pa'i
T02D2533:64a-0: phyir ro // gsang sngags rgyal po ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i gsang @64a * //
T02D2533:64a-1: sngags rnams kyi rgyal po ni gsang sngags rgyal po'o //
T02D2533:64a-2: don chen byed ni don yang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas don chen no //
T02D2533:64a-3: de byed pas na don chen byed de las kyi
T02D2533:64a-4: dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
T02D2533:64a-5: las 'das pa'i mchod pa ma lus pa phyi dang
T02D2533:64a-6: gsang ba dang sems las byung ba gsum gyis de
T02D2533:64a-7: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par byed pa nyid
T02D2533:64a-8: kyis gzhal du med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs nye
T02D2533:64a-9: bar sogs par byed pas na sems can thams cad
T02D2533:64a-10: kyi don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:64a-11: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
T02D2533:64a-13: de la gtsug tor chen po ni gtsug tor yang
T02D2533:64a-14: de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas
T02D2533:64a-15: na gtsug tor chen po ste /
T02D2533:64a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi
T02D2533:64a-17: rnam pas phung por gyur cing 'phungs [?] par gyur
T02D2533:64a-18: par rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:64a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi gtsug yin
T02D2533:64a-20: pas de'i phyir yang gtsug tor chen po zhes gsungs
T02D2533:64a-21: so // rmad byung gtsug ni gzi brjid spungs pa'i
T02D2533:64a-22: sgo nas gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2533:64a-23: thams cad dang ye shes sems dpa' gang yin pa
T02D2533:64a-24: 'di gzi brjid kyi phung po'i sgo nas de bzhin
T02D2533:64a-25: gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor las spros pa'i
T02D2533:64a-26: rdo rje'i tshul du spyi bor gnas pa gang yin
T02D2533:64a-27: pa de ni rmad byung gtsug ces gsungs so //
T02D2533:64a-28: nam mkha' bdag po ni nam mkha' ni nam mkha' ste /
T02D2533:64a-29: nam mkha' de'i bdag po ste stong pa nyid kyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2533:64a-31: dmigs pa dang ni bral ba'i sems //
T02D2533:64a-32: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la gnas te //
T02D2533:64a-33: nam mkha' sgom par byed pa 'di //
T02D2533:64a-34: stong pa nyid ni bsgom par 'dod //
T02D2533:64a-36: sna tshogs ston ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
T02D2533:64a-37: 'das pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rang
T02D2533:64a-39: rnam pa tha dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam
T02D2533:64a-40: par thar pa'i sgo ston par byed pa'i tshul dang
T02D2533:64a-41: gang ldan pa de sna tshogs ston zhes pa'o //
T02D2533:64a-42: sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo bo mchog /'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
T02D2533:64a-44: de la sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo bo mchog ni
T02D2533:64a-45: sangs rgyas kyang de yin la kun kyang de yin
T02D2533:64b-1: rtag pa la sogs pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kun bdag go //
T02D2533:64b-2: sangs rgyas kun bdag de'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin no //
T02D2533:64b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo yod pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T02D2533:64b-4: mchog gi dngos po ni mchog nyid do //
T02D2533:64b-5: sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo bos de'i de bzhin nyid
T02D2533:64b-6: du ro gcig pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das 'jam
T02D2533:64b-7: dpal te / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2533:64b-8: thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku nyid kyi phyir
T02D2533:64b-9: dpal te / ro // 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
T02D2533:64b-10: zhes pa ni 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba ni 'gro ba dga' ba ste /
T02D2533:64b-11: de'i mig dang ldan pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal te /
T02D2533:64b-13: spong ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i snang bas na shes rab kyi spyan no //
T02D2533:64b-14: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las byung //
T02D2533:64b-17: de la sna tshogs gzugs can ni g-yo ba dang /
T02D2533:64b-18: mi g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin
T02D2533:64b-19: nyid kyis na gzugs sna tshogs pa ston pa nyid
T02D2533:64b-20: kyi phyir ro // skyed pa po ni sems can
T02D2533:64b-21: thams cad ji ltar skal ba dang ldan pa'i gzugs
T02D2533:64b-22: nyid kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig dang
T02D2533:64b-23: dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:64b-24: drang srong che ni drang srong yang de yin la
T02D2533:64b-25: che ba yang de nyid yin pas drang srong che
T02D2533:64b-26: ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni drang srong che zhes so //
T02D2533:64b-27: mchod 'os zhes pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
T02D2533:64b-28: las 'das pa kun gyis mchod par 'os pa nyid
T02D2533:64b-31: de nyid kyi phyir brjod 'os te sems can thams cad kyis bstod pa'o //
T02D2533:64b-33: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin //
T02D2533:64b-35: de la rigs gsum 'chang ba ni sku gsung thugs
T02D2533:64b-36: kyi dbye bas de 'dzin pa ni rigs gsum 'chang
T02D2533:64b-37: ba'o // gsang sngags 'chang ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags te /
T02D2533:64b-38: de rnams dang gang ldan pa de ni gsang sngags can te /
T02D2533:64b-39: de nyid bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' ste /
T02D2533:64b-40: gsang sngags kyi sku thams cad 'chang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:64b-41: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin ni dam tshig
T02D2533:64b-42: kyang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas
T02D2533:65a-1: 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2533:65a-2: de'i sngags ni shes shing skyob bas gsang sngags te /
T02D2533:65a-3: ye shes dang snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:65a-4: de 'dzin pas na dam tshig tshin [?] po gsang
T02D2533:65a-5: sngags 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2533:65a-6: thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D2533:65a-7: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
T02D2533:65a-8: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po //
T02D2533:65a-10: de la gtso bo ni mngon par 'gro ba thams
T02D2533:65a-11: cad kyi nang na gang dang por shin tu mngon
T02D2533:65a-12: par 'gro bar 'os pa ni de gtso bor gsungs
T02D2533:65a-13: te / de yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2533:65a-14: dkon mchog gsum ni dkon mchog rnams ni gsum ste /
T02D2533:65a-16: rin thang che ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2533:65a-17: rab tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:65a-18: rin po che dang 'dra bas dkon mchog go //
T02D2533:65a-22: de rnams 'dzin pas na dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2533:65a-23: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po ni nyan thos dang /
T02D2533:65a-25: theg pa chen po gsum rab tu ston pa ste /
T02D2533:65a-26: sems can gyi rigs thams cad la dbang po dang /
T02D2533:65a-28: bag la nyal ba mkhyen pa'i sgo nas ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:65a-29: don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //
T02D2533:65a-30: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
T02D2533:65a-31: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02D2533:65a-33: de la don yod zhags pa ni don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'o //
T02D2533:65a-34: zhags pa dang 'dra bas na zhags pa ste //
T02D2533:65a-35: de gang dang ldan pa de ni don yod zhags pa ste /
T02D2533:65a-36: byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes 'dul ba'i sems can
T02D2533:65a-37: rnams la de bzhin du so sor snang ba'i phyir
T02D2533:65a-38: ro // rnam par rgyal ba ni 'jig rten gsum
T02D2533:65a-39: las rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
T02D2533:65a-40: ro // nas so // 'dzin pa chen po zhes
T02D2533:65a-41: pa ni 'dzin par byed pas na 'dzin pa ste
T02D2533:65a-42: ro // nas so // / 'dzin pa yang de
T02D2533:65a-43: yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas 'dzin
T02D2533:65a-44: pa chen po ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02D2533:65a-45: de yang snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin gyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:65a-46: rdo rje zhags pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:65a-47: rdo rje lcags khu ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2533:65b-0: zhags pa che zhes pa ni zhags pa dang sdom zhes pa 'bebs pa'i rnam @65b grangs te /
T02D2533:65b-1: zhags pa yang de yin la chen po yang de
T02D2533:65b-2: nyid yin pas zhags pa che ni rdo rje 'bebs
T02D2533:65b-3: pa'o // de yang don yod grub pa'i ngo bos so //
T02D2533:65b-5: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02D2533:65b-6: zhes pa la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed
T02D2533:65b-7: pa'i sgra'i tshogs rnams kyis sngags kyi yig 'bru'i rnam
T02D2533:65b-8: par dbye ba dang po'i mtha' can gyi bstan pa
T02D2533:65b-9: brjod par bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2533:65b-10: de nas 'dir yang sngon bzhin du rnam par snang
T02D2533:65b-11: mdzad chen po la sogs pa sku mdog dkar po
T02D2533:65b-12: dang / 'khor lo dang ral gri phyag na 'dzin par gyur pa rnams phyung ste /
T02D2533:65b-13: phyung nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song ste /
T02D2533:65b-14: sems can thams cad rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas dag par byas te /
T02D2533:65b-15: yang phyir log nas mtshan gyi sngags kyi yig 'brur
T02D2533:65b-16: gyur nas rang gi 'khor lo la 'khor lo can
T02D2533:65b-17: du gyur te gnas par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2533:65b-18: de nas gong ma bzhin du sngags kyi sgo nas
T02D2533:65b-19: spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas mtshan yang
T02D2533:65b-20: dag par brjod pa bklag par bya ste /
T02D2533:65b-21: de yon tan gyi tshogs pa bkod pa de rnams nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2533:65b-22: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i 'khor lo gnyis pa
T02D2533:65b-23: la mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i gzhi rnams ni

T02D2533:72a-16: cher 'phel ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2533:72a-17: chos kyi tog ni chos rnams kyi tog ste /
T02D2533:72a-18: chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2533:72a-19: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag / ces pa ni /

T02D2533:72a-41: phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid dang /

T02D2533:72a-44: rting ba yangs pa nyid dang /
T02D2533:72b-0: sku che @72b zhing drang ba nyid dang /
T02D2533:72b-1: zhabs long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T02D2533:72b-2: sku'i sbu gyen du phyogs pa nyid dang /
T02D2533:72b-3: phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang /
T02D2533:72b-4: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid dang /

T02D2533:72b-14: dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang /

T02D2533:72b-20: tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /

T02D2533:72b-26: cad mkhyen pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i khes bu

T02D2533:72b-29: gsal la gnas par gyur ba yin no //

T02D2533:72b-32: rdzogs pa'i mtshan ni thub chen gyi //
T02D2533:72b-34: sdu gu ni sdug pa ste /
T02D2533:72b-36: sems can thams cad kyis 'dun pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:72b-37: 'jig rten gsum na mdzes pa ni //

T02D2533:72b-39: de la mdzes pa ni blta na sdug pa ste /

T02D2533:72b-46: dga' bas blta bas mi ngoms pa'o //
T02D2533:72b-47: blta bas mi ngoms pa'i gzugs so zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:72b-48: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
T02D2533:72b-51: de la 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon ni shes pa dang /
T02D2533:73a-2: 'jig rten rnams kyi shes legs ni 'jig rten shes legs te /

T02D2533:73a-4: 'jig rten slob dpon ni lha dang mi la sogs
T02D2533:73a-5: pa rnams la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du

T02D2533:73a-8: 'jigs pa med pa ni sprul pa sna tshogs kyi
T02D2533:73a-9: gzugs bstan pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don ma lus

T02D2533:73a-11: bag tsha ba med pa'i don to //
T02D2533:73a-12: mgon skyob 'jig rten yid gcugs pa //
T02D2533:73a-13: skyabs dang skyob ba bla na med //
T02D2533:73a-15: de la mgon ni mgon med pa'i sems can 'khor
T02D2533:73a-16: ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams kyi mgon du gyur
T02D2533:73a-17: ba'i phyir ro // skyabs ni skyabs 'dod pa rnams skyob pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:73a-18: 'jig rten gsum gyi yid gcugs pa ni //
T02D2533:73a-20: rnam pa thams cad du stong pa nyid chen po

T02D2533:73a-22: thibs po'i 'gro ba ma lus pa 'joms pa nyid

T02D2533:73a-25: bla na med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2533:73a-26: cad kyi bla na med pa'i ye shes thob pa
T02D2533:73a-28: nam mkha'i longs spyod yang dag spyod //
T02D2533:73a-29: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
T02D2533:73a-31: de la nam mkha'i longs spyod yang dag spyod ni
T02D2533:73a-32: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2533:73a-33: rjes su longs spyod pa ni legs par gnas pa'i
T02D2533:73a-35: yang dag par longs spyod pa ni yang dag par longs spyod de /
T02D2533:73a-36: nam mkha'i longs spyod yang dag spyod do //
T02D2533:73a-37: nam mkha'i longs spyod yang dag spyod ni khams gsum
T02D2533:73a-38: gyi chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang sgyur ba'i gtso
T02D2533:73a-39: bo'i phyir ro // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2533:73a-40: mtsho ni thams cad mkhyen pas na thams cad mkhyen
T02D2533:73a-41: bo'i phyir ro // pa ste // de'i ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2533:73a-43: mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2533:73a-44: de nyid mtsho ste shin tu rgya che ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:73a-45: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa //
T02D2533:73a-46: srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po //
T02D2533:73a-48: de la ma rig pa ni las dang 'bras bu
T02D2533:73b-0: bden @73b pa dang dkon mchog rnams mi shes pa'i
T02D2533:73b-1: bdag nyid kyi gti mug ste /
T02D2533:73b-2: de nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dang po nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D2533:73b-3: 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir na ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:73b-4: de 'byed pa ni 'joms pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa ste /
T02D2533:73b-5: 'dral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:73b-7: srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po //
T02D2533:73b-9: srid pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
T02D2533:73b-10: de nyid dra ba ste mi thar ba'i gnas nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:73b-11: de 'joms pa ni yang dag pa'i don bsgoms pas

T02D2533:73b-13: ro // nyon mongs lus zhi byed pa ;
T02D2533:73b-14: /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //

T02D2533:73b-17: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2533:73b-18: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2533:73b-19: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
T02D2533:73b-20: de la nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa dang ;
T02D2533:73b-23: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'du byed dang /
T02D2533:73b-25: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni yan lag lhag ma rnams so //
T02D2533:73b-26: yang nas nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2533:73b-27: rgyu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2533:73b-28: 'bras bu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
T02D2533:73b-29: de la rgyu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2533:73b-30: las kyi rang bzhin gyi yan lag rnams so //
T02D2533:73b-31: 'bras bu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni yan lag lhag ma rnams so //
T02D2533:73b-32: yang na nyon mongs pa rnam pa bdun ni rgyu rnams pa bdun te /
T02D2533:73b-33: phyin ci log pa'i rgyu ni ma rig pa'o //
T02D2533:73b-34: brag pa med pa'i rgyu ni 'du byed do //
T02D2533:73b-35: nye bar sbyor ba'i rgyu ni rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D2533:73b-36: yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug go //
T02D2533:73b-37: nye bar spyod pa'i rgyu ni reg pa dang tshor ba'o //
T02D2533:73b-38: 'dren pa'i rgyu ni sred pa dang /

T02D2533:73b-44: ma lus zhi byed ni ma lus mi lus pa'o
T02D2533:73b-45: nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang

T02D2533:73b-50: ye shes dbang bskur dbu rgyan can /

T02D2533:74a-4: ni dbang bskur dbu rgyan can no //

T02D2533:74a-6: cod pan de dang gang ldan pa de ni ye
T02D2533:74a-7: shes dbang bskur dbu rgyan can no //
T02D2533:74a-9: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan //
T02D2533:74a-11: de rnams kyis brgyan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:74a-12: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
T02D2533:74a-13: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum 'gro //
T02D2533:74a-15: de la sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi ni gnyis bstan te /
T02D2533:74a-16: sdug bsngal gsum ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
T02D2533:74a-17: nye bar len pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
T02D2533:74a-19: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i tshor ba rgyu dang bcas pa'i don de /
T02D2533:74a-20: gang cung zad myong ba de ni 'dir sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:74a-21: yang tshor ba'i rgyu ni tshor ba'i gnas su 'os ba'i chos rnams rig par bya'o //
T02D2533:74a-23: sdug bsngal ni 'khor ba'i phung po rnams so zhes so //
T02D2533:74a-24: sdug bsngal ni de'i rgyu grub kun 'byung gi bden pa ste /
T02D2533:74a-25: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rgyu ni grub byed gang yin pa'o //
T02D2533:74a-26: zhi ba ni de gnyis ni zhi ba'i don gyis na 'gog pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D2533:74a-28: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
T02D2533:74a-31: gsum mtha' ni bden pa gsum gyi mtha' ma yin pas na gsum mtha' zhes bya ste /
T02D2533:74a-33: de yang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong
T02D2533:74a-34: lam gyi bden pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi phyir
T02D2533:74a-35: na'o ; / de la sems can rnams kyi sems
T02D2533:74a-36: kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por
T02D2533:74a-37: gyur bas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong
T02D2533:74a-41: grol gsum 'gro ni grol gsum ni nyan thos la
T02D2533:74a-42: sogs pas phye ba'i grol bar 'gro bas na grol
T02D2533:74a-43: gsum 'gro ste / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2533:74a-44: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
T02D2533:74a-45: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02D2533:74a-47: de la sgrib pa kun las nges par grol ni
T02D2533:74a-48: kun yang de yin la sgrib pa yang de yin
T02D2533:74b-0: nyon mongs pa dang las dang rnams par @74b smin
T02D2533:74b-1: pa dang shes bya dang nyon mongs par 'jug pa'i
T02D2533:74b-3: lnga po rnams ni sgrib pa kun //
T02D2533:74b-5: de rnams las rnam par grol ba ni bcom ldan
T02D2533:74b-6: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
T02D2533:74b-7: kyi sku'o // de nyid kyi phyir na gsungs pa /
T02D2533:74b-8: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02D2533:74b-10: sgrib pa thams cad las nges par grol ba nyid kyi phyir ro //

T02D2533:74b-14: de la nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das ni
T02D2533:74b-15: nyon mongs kun ni gong du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2533:74b-16: rnams te / de rnams nyid dri ma rnams so //

T02D2533:74b-24: dus med rtogs pa po ni dus med pas na dus med pa ste /

T02D2533:74b-27: ma thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D2533:74b-28: da ltar ni gnyis ka med pa'i phyir gnas pa med do //
T02D2533:74b-29: de'i phyir na dus gsum mi 'grub ste /

T02D2533:74b-31: sems can kun gyi klu chen po //

T02D2533:74b-34: de la sems can kun gyi klu chen ni rtogs
T02D2533:74b-35: pa khyad par can gyi chos de rnyed pa'i phyir
T02D2533:74b-37: chen po ni sems can kun gyi klu ste /
T02D2533:74b-40: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
T02D2533:74b-42: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa kun gyi

T02D2533:74b-46: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
T02D2533:74b-48: dper na me tog rnams spyi bor bzhag na /
T02D2533:74b-49: 'jig rten na thod ces grags pa de bzhin du

T02D2533:74b-51: na gnas pa'i phyir na yon tan thod can rnams
T02D2533:74b-53: lus kun las ni rnam grol zhing //
T02D2533:74b-54: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa //
T02D2533:74b-56: de la lus kun las ni rnam grol ba ni lus ni bzhi ste /
T02D2533:75a-2: chos de bzhi rnams las kyang grol ba nyid kyi phyir na lus kun las ni rnam grol ba'o //

T02D2533:75a-4: mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //

T02D2533:75a-6: lam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

T02D2533:75a-8: de ltar yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong ba las gsungs pa //

T02D2533:75a-11: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam
T02D2533:75a-13: / yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //

T02D2533:75a-16: de la yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang ni
T02D2533:75a-17: yid bzhin nor bu yang de yin la chen po

T02D2533:75a-24: khyab bdag gi don ni bshad zin to //

T02D2533:75a-26: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog //

T02D2533:75a-34: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog ni bum pa

T02D2533:75a-37: mchog go // byed pa sems can kun don byed //

T02D2533:98b-11: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //

T02D2533:98b-16: de rnams 'gro bar byed pa ste /

T02D2533:98b-19: gzugs rnams ma lus ston pa po //

T02D2533:98b-25: rin chen tog ni 'gro ba thams cad chags par byed pa'i don gyis rin chen no //
T02D2533:98b-26: rin chen des mtshan pa'i tog go //

T02D2533:98b-36: nor bu chen po zhes te /

T02D2533:98b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nor bu chen

T02D2533:99a-1: yas 'byam klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs

T02D2533:99a-11: chen po'i phyi rol 'khor lo bzhi pa la rang

T02D2533:99a-16: sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i rigs kyi
T02D2533:99a-17: bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos 'phags pa mtshan yang

T02D2533:99a-20: tshigs su bcad pa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D2533:99a-21: mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge grangs ni brgya rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D2533:99a-22: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher
T02D2533:99a-23: 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par

T02D2533:99a-25: shes kyi rang bzhin gyi bstod pa'i rim pa'i dbang
T02D2533:99a-26: du byas pa ste dgu pa'o /
T02D2533:99a-28: // / da ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes
T02D2533:99a-29: kyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2533:99a-30: thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bstod pa 'di
T02D2533:99a-31: brjod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa //
T02D2533:99a-32: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
T02D2533:99a-33: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
T02D2533:99a-34: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
T02D2533:99a-35: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
T02D2533:99a-37: de la sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba ni
T02D2533:99a-38: dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
T02D2533:99a-39: rtogs par bya zhing shes par bya ba mngon du
T02D2533:99a-40: bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid yin pas
T02D2533:99a-41: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba'o //
T02D2533:99a-42: de ltar yang dpal de nyid 'dus pa las gsungs pa //
T02D2533:99a-43: mngon par byang chub khyed la brten //
T02D2533:99a-44: khyed ni kun gzigs yab yin te //
T02D2533:99a-46: de bzhin gshegs rnams khyed la brten //
T02D2533:99a-48: sangs rgyas byang chub ni nyan thos la sogs pa

T02D2533:99b-2: byang chub rnam pa gsum ni ji skad gsungs pa'i nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /
T02D2533:99b-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
T02D2533:99b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnams so //
T02D2533:99b-5: rnam pa gsum yin yang de nyid bla na med pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2533:99b-6: 'di las bla na med pas bla na med pa'o //
T02D2533:99b-7: gsang sngags las byung ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig

T02D2533:99b-9: gnas nyid kyi phyir na gsang sngags 'byung ba ste

T02D2533:99b-11: yi ge med ni gang la brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D2533:99b-12: brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yi ge rnams med pa de ni yi ge rnams med pa ste /
T02D2533:99b-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //

T02D2533:99b-15: de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas

T02D2533:99b-21: gang ldan pa de ni gsang sngags chen po rigs
T02D2533:99b-22: gsum pa ste / sku gsung thugs nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:99b-23: de yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
T02D2533:99b-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
T02D2533:99b-25: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2533:99b-26: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nam mkha'i tshul
T02D2533:99b-27: nges par sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched
T02D2533:99b-29: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
T02D2533:99b-30: thig le chen po yi ge med //
T02D2533:99b-31: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
T02D2533:99b-32: thig le stong pa yi ge drug / ces pa
