T02D2533:99b-34: ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang
T02D2533:99b-35: sngags thams cad kyi don te /
T02D2533:99b-36: de skyed pa ni 'byin par byed pa ste /
T02D2533:99b-38: thig le chen po ni dang po'i yi ge aa
T02D2533:99b-39: nas ha la thug pa'i bar du dbyangs dang gsal
T02D2533:99b-40: byed rnams ni thig le chen po zhes gsungs te
T02D2533:99b-41: ; de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
T02D2533:99b-42: yi ge med ni don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:99b-43: stong pa chen po ni stong pa nyid rnam pa bcu drug gi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:99b-44: yi ge lnga ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i yi ge 'bru a'a aom h'um hr'i ;
T02D2533:99b-46: zhes pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir na yi ge aa zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:100a-0: @100a * // thig le stong pa zhes pa la thig le ni sa bon gyi yi ge'o //
T02D2533:100a-1: de la don dam par mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:100a-2: yi ge drug ni aom wa' g'i shva ri mum
T02D2533:100a-3: zhes te yi ge drug pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir
T02D2533:100a-4: ro // rnam pa kun gyi rnam pa med //
T02D2533:100a-5: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
T02D2533:100a-6: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02D2533:100a-7: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
T02D2533:100a-8: zhes pa ni de la rnam pa kun gyi rnam
T02D2533:100a-9: pa med ni rnam pa kun ni skyes bu chen
T02D2533:100a-10: po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa'i chos
T02D2533:100a-11: de rnams kun gang yin pa las 'das shing med
T02D2533:100a-12: pa'i rnam pa'i yan lag dang gang ldan pa de
T02D2533:100a-14: de ltar yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sum brgya pa las gsungs pa /
T02D2533:100a-15: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T02D2533:100a-16: mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par blta'am /
T02D2533:100a-18: bcom ldan 'das mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin
T02D2533:100a-19: gshegs par blta bar bya ba 'di ni ma lags
T02D2533:100a-20: so // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2533:100a-21: gang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pas
T02D2533:100a-22: gsungs pa de nyid mtshan phun sum tshogs pa ma
T02D2533:100a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
T02D2533:100a-25: rab 'byor ji srid ji srid du mtshan phun sum tshogs pa de srid du brdzun no //
T02D2533:100a-26: ji srid du mtshan phun sum tshogs pa med pa de srid du brdzun pa ma lags so //
T02D2533:100a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma yin par blta bar bya'o zhes te /
T02D2533:100a-29: de kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:100a-30: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
T02D2533:100a-31: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02D2533:100a-32: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can ni de bdag
T02D2533:100a-33: gi bla ma'i lung yin pa'i phyir na tshig rkang
T02D2533:100a-34: gsum gyi don bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02D2533:100a-35: de'i phyir na bdag cag gi bla mas ji lta ba bzhin du bdag la gsungs pa /
T02D2533:100a-36: sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa las thams
T02D2533:100a-37: cad so sor rtogs pa dad pa dang yang dag
T02D2533:100a-38: par ldan pa'i slob ma rnams dus ring por mnyes
T02D2533:100a-39: par byed pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par las sgyu 'phrul
T02D2533:100a-40: dra ba'i mngon par byang chub pa'i bla ma'i man
T02D2533:100a-41: ngag snyan khung nas snyan khung du brgyud pa rab
T02D2533:100a-43: de'i phyir de'i sbyor ba 'tsham de'i sbyor ba 'tshams
T02D2533:100b-0: pa bgoms pas @100b /'jigs pas t'i k'a las 'di
T02D2533:100b-2: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
T02D2533:100b-4: ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog / longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2533:100b-5: zhes pa ni de la bsam gtan yan lag kun
T02D2533:100b-6: shes shing ni bsam gtan kun ni bzhi rnams te
T02D2533:100b-10: bde ba zhes pa rnams las so //
T02D2533:100b-11: de la rtog pa dang bcas /
T02D2533:100b-13: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can ni bsam gtan dang po'o //
T02D2533:100b-14: rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs pa ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'o //
T02D2533:100b-15: dga' ba yang med cing btang snyoms dang dran pa
T02D2533:100b-16: yang dag par ldan pa ni bsam gtan gsum pa'o
T02D2533:100b-17: // sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma
T02D2533:100b-18: yin pa'i btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag
T02D2533:100b-19: pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o //
T02D2533:100b-20: bsam gtan bzhi po de dag gi yan lag ste cha shas 'di rnams so //
T02D2533:100b-21: lde shes na ni mkhas pa ste /
T02D2533:100b-22: bsam gtan de rab tu 'byed pa la yang sbyor ba'i phyir te /
T02D2533:100b-23: de la mos pa'i sems can kun du bzang po'i don yin no //
T02D2533:100b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa mngon du byed de /
T02D2533:100b-26: sems can gyi don gyis gnas pas na de'i dbang gis skye ba ni ma yin no //
T02D2533:100b-27: dre bzhin du 'og nas bshad pa las kyang lha cho ring por mi skye bar shes pa ste /
T02D2533:100b-28: de rnams su skye ba la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:100b-29: ting 'dzin rigs dang rgyud 'chang ba ni ting nge
T02D2533:100b-30: 'dzin rnams ni de yang mchog tu dge ba la
T02D2533:100b-31: rtse gcig pa'i rnam par bsgom pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D2533:100b-32: na bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2533:100b-33: do // go rims bzhin du rang gi ming dang
T02D2533:100b-34: don gyi rjes su dran pa'i rab tu dbye ba
T02D2533:100b-36: de bas na de rnams kyi rigs dang rgyud ni
T02D2533:100b-37: gdon mi za bar nyan thos la sogs pa ste
T02D2533:100b-38: / de 'dzin pas na ting 'dzin rigs dang rgyud 'chang ba'o //
T02D2533:100b-39: ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog ni ting nge 'dzin gyi lus ni lus kyi sku'o //
T02D2533:100b-40: de nyid kyi phyir sprul pa la sogs pa'i lus
T02D2533:100b-41: thams cad las mchog dang rab yin pas na ting
T02D2533:100b-42: 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog ste /
T02D2533:101a-0: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal ni longs spyod @101a * //
T02D2533:101a-1: rdzogs pa'i sku thams cad du gyur pa bcom ldan
T02D2533:101a-2: 'das 'jam dpal 'khor thams cad kyi nang na che
T02D2533:101a-3: ba'i bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa bden pa'i don
T02D2533:101a-4: 'bras bu dang bcas pa sna tshogs pa bsam du
T02D2533:101a-5: med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2533:101a-6: dpa' thams cad dga' ba'i rgyu rab tu ston par
T02D2533:101a-7: byed pa'i phyir na bstan to //
T02D2533:101a-8: de 'ang de nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mdzes shing
T02D2533:101a-9: 'bar bas na longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal
T02D2533:101a-10: lo // de ltar yang gsungs pa /
T02D2533:101a-11: bdag gi sbyor ba 'jig rten las 'das bsam gyis mi khyab legs mdzad legs pa'i 'bru //
T02D2533:101a-12: blo chen rnams kyi dga' ba'i rgyu ni 'khor ba'i nang du sna tshogs rab ston cing //
T02D2533:101a-13: dam pa'i chos kyi sgra chen rtag tu 'jig rten khams rnams kun dur rab 'phro ba //
T02D2533:101a-14: sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal srid che la bzhugs pa de la 'dir ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2533:101a-16: sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
T02D2533:101a-17: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
T02D2533:101a-18: ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2533:101a-19: zhes pa ni de la sprul pa'i sku ste sku'i
T02D2533:101a-20: mchog ni sprul pa'i bdag nyid kyi sku ni sprul
T02D2533:101a-21: pa'i sku'o // de 'ang gzhan 'jig rten pa'i sprul
T02D2533:101a-22: pa rnams kyi nang na rab kyi phyir na sku'i
T02D2533:101a-25: sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i rgyu phyir la lar 'bar pa'i me bzhin gang snang zhing //
T02D2533:101a-26: la lar yang ni rdzogs byang chub dang chos kyi 'khor lo rab bzhir gang snang ba //
T02D2533:101a-27: rnam pa du mar 'jug cing srid gsum rab 'dzin sna tshogs thabs kyis 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D2533:101a-28: thub pa rnams kyi don chen phyogs bcur rjes mngon sprul sku de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2533:101a-30: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba ni dus gsum
T02D2533:101a-31: na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa de
T02D2533:101a-32: rnams kyi rgyud ni rim pa ste /
T02D2533:101a-33: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud do //
T02D2533:101a-34: de 'dzin pas na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba ste /
T02D2533:101a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:101a-36: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs pa ni phyogs bcu
T02D2533:101a-37: po rnams su rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i
T02D2533:101a-38: sprul pa'i cho 'phrul dang gang ldan pa de phyogs
T02D2533:101a-39: bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'o //
T02D2533:101b-0: @101b de nyid kyi phyir na ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa ste //
T02D2533:101b-1: ji bzhin phyin ci ma log par don bstan pa'i
T02D2533:101b-2: sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pas na ji bzhin
T02D2533:101b-4: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha //
T02D2533:101b-5: lha min dbang po lha min bdag /'chi med dbang po lha yi bla //
T02D2533:101b-7: / zhes pa ni de la lha'i dbang po ni khyab 'jug gi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:101b-8: lha'i lha ni tshangs pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:101b-9: lha min dbang po ni rnam par snang byed 'be le'i gzugs kyis so //
T02D2533:101b-10: lha min bdag ni gza' r'a hu la'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:101b-11: 'chi med dbang po ni grong khyer 'jig gi gzugs nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:101b-12: lha'i bla ni gza' phur bu'i gzugs nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:101b-13: 'joms byed ni tshogs bdag gi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:101b-14: 'joms byed dbang phyug ni ma h'a de wa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:101b-15: lha'i dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de nyid la mngon par brjod par bya'o //
T02D2533:101b-16: srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba //
T02D2533:101b-17: ston pa gcig po 'gro pa'i bla //
T02D2533:101b-18: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
T02D2533:101b-19: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po //
T02D2533:101b-20: zhes pa ni de la srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba ni srid pa ni 'khor ba'o //
T02D2533:101b-21: de nyid kyi dgon pa ste brgal dka' ba nyid kyi phyir na srid pa'i dgon pa'o //
T02D2533:101b-22: gang gis srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba de ni srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba'o //
T02D2533:101b-23: gcig pu ni gnyis su med pa ste //
T02D2533:101b-24: de dang 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:101b-25: de nyid kyi phyir na ston pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:101b-26: ston pa ni gang sems can thams cad kyi bya
T02D2533:101b-27: ba ston par byed pas na ston pa yin no
T02D2533:101b-28: // de la sems can thams cad kyi ston pa
T02D2533:101b-29: ni khyad par med pa bcom ldan 'das 'dam dpal
T02D2533:101b-30: // de nyid de / sems can thams cad kyi
T02D2533:101b-31: bya ba ston par byed pa nyid kyis byed pa'o
T02D2533:101b-33: ngan song du skyes pa rnam la yang de bzhin
T02D2533:101b-34: gshegs pa'i sku yi 'od zer las de bzhin gshegs
T02D2533:101b-35: pa'i sku bstan pas rab tu dang bar byas te
T02D2533:101b-36: mtho ris la so sor 'jog par byed do //
T02D2533:101b-37: mtho ris su skyes pa rnams la yang skal pa
T02D2533:101b-38: dang mi ldan pa kha cig rnams la gong du
T02D2533:101b-39: gsungs pa'i tshogs bsam pa yongs su dag par byas
T02D2533:101b-40: nas 'khor ba'i bde ba'i las sbyin pa la sogs
T02D2533:102a-2: skal pa dang ldan pa rigs rnams la yang bsam
T02D2533:102a-3: pa rnam pa gnyis kyis nye par ston pa rnams
T02D2533:102a-4: kyis te / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa
T02D2533:102a-5: rnams kya dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par bya ba
T02D2533:102a-6: kyis te / dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
T02D2533:102a-7: su bskrun pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
T02D2533:102a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams ni yongs su grol bar byas te /
T02D2533:102a-10: rigs ji lta ba bzhin du nyan thos la sogs pa la so sor 'jog go //
T02D2533:102a-11: da ltar ngan song dang mtho ris su skyes pa
T02D2533:102a-12: rnams kyi skal ba dang ldan pa dang mi ldan
T02D2533:102a-13: pa'i rigs rnams la bya ba mthun par bsgrub pa'i
T02D2533:102a-14: phyir na de nyid sems can thams cad kyi ston
T02D2533:102a-16: de nyid kyi phyir na 'gro ba'i bla ma ste /
T02D2533:102a-17: 'gro ba rnams kyi bla ma yin pas 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
T02D2533:102a-18: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
T02D2533:102a-19: chos kyi sbyin bdag ni phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten no //
T02D2533:102a-20: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kyang de yin la rab grags
T02D2533:102a-21: kyang de nyid yin pas 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab
T02D2533:102a-22: grags pa ste / 'jig rten na phyogs bcur grags pa ste /
T02D2533:102a-23: de rnams la chos kyi sbyin bdag gang yin pa de /
T02D2533:102a-24: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
T02D2533:102a-26: de nyid che ba po zhes te ;
T02D2533:102a-27: / g-yo bdang mi g-yo ba'i dngos po rnams la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:102a-28: de ltar yang dbal bde mchog gi rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D2533:102a-29: kun du kun nas thams cad du //
T02D2533:102a-30: bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun //
T02D2533:102a-31: sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g-yo kun //
T02D2533:102a-32: kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to //
T02D2533:102a-34: byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste //
T02D2533:102a-35: snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos //
T02D2533:102a-36: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2533:102a-37: nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel //
T02D2533:102a-38: zhes pa ni de la byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste ni /
T02D2533:102a-39: byams pa ni sems can thams cad la bshes dang
T02D2533:102a-40: grogs dang bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa rnams
T02D2533:102a-41: so ; khyams pa des go cha ni byams pa'i go cha gang gis chas pa ste /
T02D2533:102a-42: byams pa'i go cha chas pa'o //
T02D2533:102a-43: snying rje yi ni ya lang bgos ni snying rje ni ji snyed gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2533:102a-44: de nyid ya lad de snying rje'i ya lad do //
T02D2533:102b-0: snying rje'i ya lad de bgos pas bsrung ba gang yin de snying rje'i ya lad @102b bgos so //
T02D2533:102b-1: shes rab ral gri mnga' gzhu thogs ni /
T02D2533:102b-2: shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu sti'o //
T02D2533:102b-3: ral gri ni ye shes kyi ral gri'o //
T02D2533:102b-4: mda' ni sems phra mo yongs su 'bigs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2533:102b-6: des kyang ci gsung bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2533:102b-7: byams pa'i go cha chas shing snying rje'i ya lad
T02D2533:102b-8: kyis bsrungs pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2533:102b-9: dang ldan pa nyon mongs pa'i mi shes pa ni
T02D2533:102b-12: de sel zhing spong bas na bcom ldan 'das dngos
T02D2533:102b-13: po de nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel ba
T02D2533:102b-15: mdog dmar ba dang phyag bzhi par shes par bya'o //
T02D2533:102b-16: dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba //
T02D2533:102b-17: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed //
T02D2533:102b-18: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham par byed //
T02D2533:102b-20: zhes pa ni de la bdud dgra ni bdud rnams te bgegs kyi dgra ste bdud dgra'o //
T02D2533:102b-21: de nyid bdud 'dul zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:102b-22: rdo rje gdan la bzhugs nas bdud mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams 'joms pas na bdud 'dul ba'o //
T02D2533:102b-23: de nyid kyi phyir na dpa' po ste /
T02D2533:102b-24: mi mthun pa'i phyogs gzhan rnams kyis zil mi non pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:102b-25: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed ni bdud rnams ni bdud bzhi'o //
T02D2533:102b-26: de rnams 'jigs pa ni bdud bzhi 'jigs so //
T02D2533:102b-27: de sel bar byed cing med par byed pas na bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed do //
T02D2533:102b-28: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa ni bdud thams cad kyi dpung ni bdud kyi dpung ste de'o //
T02D2533:102b-29: de pham bar byed pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de ni bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa'o //
T02D2533:102b-30: rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas ni mtshan rnams nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2533:102b-32: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa dang po nas ji
T02D2533:102b-33: tsam 'di'i mthar thug pa'i bar du na 'jam dpal
T02D2533:102b-34: gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa phal cher la
T02D2533:102b-35: gsungs pa'o // 'jig rten 'dren ni 'jig rten rnams kyi 'dren pa po 'jig rten 'dren te /
T02D2533:102b-36: 'gro ba kun mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:102b-38: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
T02D2533:102b-40: phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
T02D2533:103a-1: pa ni de la mchod 'os ni thos pa dang
T02D2533:103a-2: dran pa rnams yongs su mthar phyin ba ni mchod
T02D2533:103a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal yang grub pa'i mtha' thams
T02D2533:103a-5: cad kyi pha rol tu son pa'i phyir na mchod
T02D2533:103a-7: bstod 'os ni bstod par 'os pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:103a-8: phyag gi gnas ni lha rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig
T02D2533:103a-9: rten rnams kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa nyid kyi
T02D2533:103a-10: phyir ro // rtog tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os
T02D2533:103a-11: ni nyan thos la sogs pa thams cad kyis ri
T02D2533:103a-12: mor bya bar 'os pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:103a-13: bkur 'os ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
T02D2533:103a-14: pa nyid kyi phyir na 'jam dpal nyid byang chub
T02D2533:103a-15: sems dpa' thams cad kyis so //
T02D2533:103a-16: rjed par bya ba'i mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2533:103a-17: thams cad kyis rjed par bya ba nyid kyi phyir
T02D2533:103a-18: ro // phyag byar 'os pa ni sngags kyi sgo
T02D2533:103a-19: spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis phyag byar 'os pa
T02D2533:103a-21: bla ma ni sems can 'di dag thams cad la rjes su ston pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2533:103a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:103a-23: de nyid kyi phyir na rab ni mchog gi phyir te /
T02D2533:103a-25: 'jig rten gsum nyid gom gcig bgrod //
T02D2533:103a-26: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon //
T02D2533:103a-27: gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste ;
T02D2533:103a-28: / mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug / ces
T02D2533:103a-29: pa ni de la 'jig rten gsum nyid gom gcig
T02D2533:103a-30: bgrod ni 'jig rten gsum po rnams mnyam por bsdus
T02D2533:103a-32: 'jig rten gsum nyid ni 'jig rten gsum mo //
T02D2533:103a-33: 'jig rten gsum po de la gom pa gcig kho
T02D2533:103a-34: nas bgrod pa'i zhabs dang gang ldan pa de 'jig
T02D2533:103a-35: rten gsum nyid gom gcig bgrod do //
T02D2533:103a-36: des ni bcom ldan 'das de'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'i bdag nyid yang dag par bstan pa yin no //
T02D2533:103a-37: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon ni mkha' ni mkha'o //
T02D2533:103a-38: de yongs su mtha' yas pa ni mtha' ltar mtha' med pa'o //
T02D2533:103a-39: de rnam par gnon pa ni pa rol gnon pa
T02D2533:103a-40: gang yin pa de ni mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam
T02D2533:103a-41: par gnon no // tshig des kyang bcom ldan 'das
T02D2533:103a-42: de'i sems can gyi don du gnon pa nges par
T02D2533:103a-44: gsum rig ni rig byed rig par bstan pa gsum ste /
T02D2533:103b-0: snyan ngag gi @103b mtshan nyid rnams ni rig byed gsum po gsum ldan dang /
T02D2533:103b-2: gtam gyi mtshan nyid kyang rung ba bsgrub pa 'am rig pas na gsum rig go //
T02D2533:103b-3: de'i rang bzhin yang bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2533:103b-4: yang na theg pa gsum po nyid kyis bsdus pa
T02D2533:103b-5: ste sde snod gsum gyi rang bzhin rig pa ni
T02D2533:103b-6: gsum po sgrub pas sam rig pas na'o //
T02D2533:103b-8: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T02D2533:103b-9: zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin rig pas na gsum rig pa'o //
T02D2533:103b-10: de nyid kyi phyir na gtsang ma zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:103b-11: rig byed rig pa'i rang bzhin lta ba yin la /
T02D2533:103b-12: 'dun pas 'dod phyir na gtsang ma zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:103b-13: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal yang grangs med pa'i theg
T02D2533:103b-14: pa la 'dun pas 'dod pa'i phyir na gtsang ma
T02D2533:103b-15: zhes gsungs so // dag pa ni des dag par byed pas na dag pa ste /
T02D2533:103b-16: dag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:103b-17: de ltar yang bshad pa chen po las gsungs so //
T02D2533:103b-18: sa la chu'i sa yongs su dag / chu la
T02D2533:103b-19: 'ang sngags rnams mchog tu dag / de yang dus
T02D2533:103b-20: tshod tshogs pas dag / drang srong chen pos lung
T02D2533:103b-22: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das dag pa nyid kyi phyir na dag pa zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:103b-23: mngon shes drug ldan ni lha'i rna ba dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T02D2533:103b-24: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2533:103b-26: zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams so //
T02D2533:103b-27: mngon par shes pa de rnams drug dang gang ldan pa de mngon shes drug ldan no //
T02D2533:103b-28: rjes dran drug ni ji snyed gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2533:103b-29: chos rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2533:103b-30: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2533:103b-31: rigs rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2533:103b-32: khro bo rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2533:103b-33: dam tshig rjes su dran pa rnams so //
T02D2533:103b-34: de'i phyir rjes su dran pa dang gang ldan pa de la de skad ces gsungs so //
T02D2533:103b-35: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2533:103b-37: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
T02D2533:103b-38: shes rab de nyid de nyid thob //
T02D2533:103b-39: ces pa ni de la byang chub sems dpa' ni
T02D2533:103b-40: chos thams cad la chags pa med pas byang chub
T02D2533:103b-41: ste / rang gi don phun su ma tshogs pa
T02D2533:103b-42: la sems dpa'i blo dang dang ldan pa de byang
T02D2533:103b-43: ste / chub sems dpa'o // de ltar yin na nyan thos la thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2533:104a-2: sems dpa' che zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:104a-3: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa chen po la
T02D2533:104a-4: sems dpa'i blo dang gang ldan pa de sems dpa'
T02D2533:104a-5: che'o // chen po yang gzhan du 'gyur ta /
T02D2533:104a-6: mu stegs kyi skye bo bzang po lta bu'o zhe na /
T02D2533:104a-7: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes gsungs so //
T02D2533:104a-8: de bas na tshig de gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid yin no //
T02D2533:104a-9: de yang 'jig rten 'das zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:104a-10: 'khor ba'i chu bo chen po'i rgyud las kun du brgal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:104a-11: rdzu 'phrul chen po ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro /
T02D2533:104a-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' ni
T02D2533:104a-13: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid shes
T02D2533:104a-14: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab
T02D2533:104a-15: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2533:104a-16: de'i mtha' ni mthar phyin cing mjug brtul bar son
T02D2533:104a-17: pa gang yin bde shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2533:104a-18: phyin pa'i mtha'o // shes rab de nyid ni shes rab de kho na ste ;
T02D2533:104a-19: shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2533:104a-21: de nyid thob pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kho na ste /
T02D2533:104a-22: de thob cing mngon du gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces gsungs so //
T02D2533:104a-23: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
T02D2533:104a-24: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /
T02D2533:104a-25: dper bya kun las 'das pa ste /
T02D2533:104a-26: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pa
T02D2533:104a-27: ni de la bdag rig ni bdag nyid rig pas
T02D2533:104a-29: gzhan rig ni gzhan rnams rig pas na gzhan rig go //
T02D2533:104a-30: thams cad ni ma lus pa'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:104a-31: kun la phan pa ni thams cad la phan pa byed pas na kun la phan pa ste /
T02D2533:104a-32: 'gro ba kun la bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:104a-33: rgyu de'i phyir na gang zag mchog ste /
T02D2533:104a-35: dper bya kun las 'das pa ste ni dngos po 'di thams cad kyi dper bya kun no //
T02D2533:104a-36: dper bya de kun las 'das pa shin tu 'das
T02D2533:104a-37: pa gang yin pa de ni dper bya kun las
T02D2533:104a-38: 'das so zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i ngo bo
T02D2533:104a-40: shes pa'i bdag po ni 'dzin pa po'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:104a-41: mchog ni rab nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:104a-42: chos kyi sbyin bdag gtso bo ste //
T02D2533:104a-43: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa /
T02D2533:104a-44: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog /
T02D2533:104b-0: @104b nges 'byung gsum po bgrod pa po //
T02D2533:104b-2: de la chos kyi sbyin bdag ni skal ba ji
T02D2533:104b-3: lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par chos
T02D2533:104b-5: de nyid kyi phyir na gtso bo zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2533:104b-6: mngon par 'gro bar bya ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ste /
T02D2533:104b-8: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa ni phyag rgya
T02D2533:104b-9: chen po la sogs pa bzhi rnams kyi don ni
T02D2533:104b-11: de'i ston pa po ni rab tu ston pa po'o //
T02D2533:104b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2533:104b-13: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog /
T02D2533:104b-15: nges 'byung gsum po ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i nges par 'byung ba ste /
T02D2533:104b-16: des bgrod pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de ni nges 'byung gsum gyis bgrod pa'o //
T02D2533:104b-17: de bas na nges 'byung gsum gyis bgrod ba'i 'gro
T02D2533:104b-18: ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur gyi gnas ni bcom
T02D2533:104b-20: thar ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:104b-21: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal //
T02D2533:104b-22: 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che //
T02D2533:104b-23: dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa //
T02D2533:104b-24: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces pa
T02D2533:104b-25: ni de la don dam chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam
T02D2533:104b-26: par dag pa'i dpal dang gang ldan pa de ni
T02D2533:104b-27: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal te /
T02D2533:104b-28: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:104b-29: de nyid kyi phyir na 'jig rten gsum na skal
T02D2533:104b-30: bzang ni 'jig rten gsum kho na la skal ba
T02D2533:104b-31: bzang po ste / sems can kun gyi don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2533:104b-32: de ltar yang dpal bde mchog gi rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D2533:104b-33: sems can kun don byed phyir na //
T02D2533:104b-34: skal bzang bcom ldan rdo rje can ;
T02D2533:104b-35: / gtan du mya ngan 'das phyir na //
T02D2533:104b-36: nyan thos thams cad skal ngan yin //
T02D2533:104b-38: che ni kun la khyab ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:104b-39: dpal ldan ni skal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:104b-40: 'byor pa kun byed pa ni phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2533:104b-41: thams cad kyi rten gyi dngos po nyid kyi phyir
T02D2533:104b-42: ro // 'jam dpal ni mtshan brjod pa yin no //
T02D2533:104b-43: dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ni de dang ldan pa'i nang na rab ces pa'i don to //
T02D2533:104b-44: de ltar de nas de ni bya ba nan tan

T02D2533:111a-6: zhes pa ni dus ji lta ba bzhin du phyin
T02D2533:111a-7: ci ma log par bstan to zhes pa'i don to
T02D2533:111a-8: // mtshan gyi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang zhes pa ni //
T02D2533:111a-9: mtshan rnams kyi don ni mtshan gyi don to //
T02D2533:111a-10: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku la dmigs te sems rtse gcig tu bsgom pa zhes pa ni /
T02D2533:111a-11: de la sems rtse gcig ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid do //
T02D2533:111a-12: kun nas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ni /

T02D2533:111a-14: de kho na nyid ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //

T02D2533:111a-18: chos thams cad rtogs pa ni zhes pa ni /

T02D2533:111a-20: de rnams rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi dad pas so //
T02D2533:111a-23: rnyog pa med pa ni skyon med pa'o //
T02D2533:111a-24: shes rab rjes su 'bigs pa'i dad pa dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2533:111a-26: dad pa nyid kyis chos ston to //

T02D2533:111a-30: ldan bzhin ni gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa can gyi'o //
T02D2533:111a-31: de la dus gsum gyi dus med pa ni dus gsum ni dus rnam pa gsum mo //

T02D2533:111a-34: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus
T02D2533:111a-35: te gshegs nas ni zhes pa ni 'dus nas 'gro

T02D2533:114b-9: phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad do //
T02D2533:114b-10: ya du ta sarbba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na
T02D2533:114b-11: ka ya manydzu shr'i pa ri shuddhi t'a ni yongs
T02D2533:114b-12: su dag pa'i chos kyi bzhin gang yin pa de
T02D2533:114b-13: / mu p'a d'a ya ti ni khas blang ngo //
T02D2533:114b-16: aa a'a: aom srab ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02D2533:114b-25: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharma dh'a tu
T02D2533:114b-26: dzny'a na garbha y'a:zhes pa ni 'phags pa mtshan yang
T02D2533:114b-27: dag par brjod pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba'o //
T02D2533:114b-28: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher
T02D2533:114b-29: 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par
T02D2533:114b-30: lta ba las shes rab kyi 'khor lo la bskong
T02D2533:114b-31: pa'i sngags kyi rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum
T02D2533:114b-33: / de nas da ni bsdus pa'i sgo nas bcom
T02D2533:114b-34: ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas lag na rdo rje
T02D2533:114b-35: mang po dang lhan cig gis mgon po zhes pa
T02D2533:114b-36: ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid
T02D2533:114b-37: do // bcom ldan zhes pa ni so sor kun
T02D2533:114b-38: du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2533:114b-39: zhes pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes
T02D2533:114b-41: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gzugs so //
T02D2533:114b-42: de ltar ye shes bzhi'i bdag nyid sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas /
T02D2533:114b-43: gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol //
T02D2533:114b-46: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2533:114b-47: dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar //
T02D2533:114b-48: mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2533:114b-49: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2533:114b-50: de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag / lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal //
T02D2533:114b-51: sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2533:114b-52: gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol //
T02D2533:115a-2: / legs so legs so legs par gsungs //
T02D2533:115a-3: bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi //
T02D2533:115a-4: byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad //
T02D2533:115a-6: kye mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo //
T02D2533:115a-7: legs so legs so legs par gsungs so //
T02D2533:115a-8: shin tu gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs so //
T02D2533:115a-9: bdag cag gi don che byas so //
T02D2533:115a-10: don ci 'dra ba zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2533:115a-11: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa ni sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'o //
T02D2533:115a-13: 'gro ba mgon med rnams kyi yang //
T02D2533:115a-14: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul ston pa //
T02D2533:115a-15: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam //
T02D2533:115a-16: zhes pa ni de la bdag cag nyi tsho'i ma yin te /
T02D2533:115a-17: mgon po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul 'di ni //
T02D2533:115a-19: 'gro ba mgon med rnams kyi yang don chen yin no //
T02D2533:115a-22: chos kyi dbyings yi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:115a-23: legs pa'i lam ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:115a-24: zab zing yangs la rgya che ste //
T02D2533:115a-25: don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2533:115a-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni //
T02D2533:115a-27: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
T02D2533:115a-28: ces pa ni de la don ci'i phyir na zab
T02D2533:115a-29: cing yangs pa'i don che ba yin pa de'i phyir
T02D2533:115a-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul yin te /
T02D2533:115a-31: nyan thos la sos pa gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin na /
T02D2533:115a-33: 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2533:115a-34: snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2533:115a-35: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
T02D2533:115a-36: ces pa ni dus gsum la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di bshad pa yin no //
T02D2533:115a-37: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher
T02D2533:115a-38: 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par
T02D2533:115a-39: lta ba las bsdus pa'i rim par phye ba ste
T02D2533:115a-41: / bdag gi blo gros 'dra ba'i nus pas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i tshul la ni //
T02D2533:115a-42: blo gros zhan pas gzung bar dka' ba'i rim pas rnam par 'grel pa byas pa yin //
T02D2533:115a-43: de yi dge bas dri ma med pa grangs med thob pas sems can sdug bsngal ba'i //
T02D2533:115b-0: srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi bar byas nas mchog gi byang @115b chub dam pa thob gyur cig //
T02D2533:115b-1: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher
T02D2533:115b-2: 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par
T02D2533:115b-3: lta ba zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po
T02D2533:115b-4: sgeg pa'i rdo rje nyi ma can gyi rin po
T02D2533:115b-5: che gling na bzhugs pa dpal ldan byang chub mchog
T02D2533:115b-6: gi sla ba dang ldan pa gang gi mtshan dpal
T02D2533:115b-7: sna tshogs gzugs can du grags pa des mdzad pa
T02D2533:115b-9: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dzny'a na
T02D2533:115b-10: k'i rtis bsgyur te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o
T02D2533:115b-11: // phyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2533:115b-12: lo ts'a ba klog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o //
